TranslationLabels.Text: Now that I think about it...

TranslationLabels.Text: I don't believe I've ever met a real bodyguard before...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_103
TranslationLabels.Text: I bet you have some really cool stories.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_104
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, trust me...it sounds more interesting than it is.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_105
TranslationLabels.Text: At the moment, my job basically consist of me doing nothing and staying out of everyone's way.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_106
TranslationLabels.Text: In fact, that's why I started playing this game.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_107
TranslationLabels.Text: To kill some time, you know?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_109
TranslationLabels.Text: Why would anyone pay you to do...that?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_111
TranslationLabels.Text: (There has to be some reason why she's not coming clean with me.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_113
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, It's a bit of a long story.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_114
TranslationLabels.Text: But to summarize, I recently started working for my father's second wife, after he unexpectedly passed away.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_115
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! I'm so sorry for your loss.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_116
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems she's really going through with this...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_120
TranslationLabels.Text: And to make matters more complicated....

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_121
TranslationLabels.Text: I recently found out these girls are my [REL_S1+].

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_123
TranslationLabels.Text: And you say your job isn't interesting?!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_124
TranslationLabels.Text: That sounds like something straight out of a movie!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_125
TranslationLabels.Text: Heh. Now that you mention it, it kinda does.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_128
TranslationLabels.Text: What do you think of them?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_129
TranslationLabels.Text: (A-ha! I think I see where this is going!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_130
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, of course I'm not at liberty to disclose any personal details about my clients.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_131
TranslationLabels.Text: And I'm only just starting to get to know them.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_132
TranslationLabels.Text: But they seem like nice, smart girls.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_133
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's put my theory to the test.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_135
TranslationLabels.Text: And they each seem to have a completely different personality.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_136
TranslationLabels.Text: So as far as I can-

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_142
TranslationLabels.Text: (If only she knew how beautiful she really is, maybe she wouldn't be so insecure.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_143
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, perhaps I can help her with that...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_144
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh yes. All three of them.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_145
TranslationLabels.Text: Although one in particular is extremely beautiful.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_147
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her replies come a lot faster now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_148
TranslationLabels.Text: (She's clearly very interested in what I have to say.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_149
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, I can't tell you her name, of course.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_150
TranslationLabels.Text: But, funnily enough, it is quite similar to the name you picked for your character.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_162
TranslationLabels.Text: Sorry, my daughter needed some help with her homework.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_165
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! I've been playing a bit longer than I thought.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_166
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe we should continue this another time?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_168
TranslationLabels.Text: I can send you a friend request if you like.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_169
TranslationLabels.Text: That way I can see when you're online and we can send each other messages.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_170
TranslationLabels.Text: I mean...in case you need some help with the game or anything.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_174
TranslationLabels.Text: (Social: You have received a friend request from Bellatrix!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_177
TranslationLabels.Text: (Social: Bellatrix has been added to your friends list!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_180
TranslationLabels.Text: I guess I'll see you around then, [NAME_1]!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_130_1_186
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, that went even better than I could have hoped!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (You are met with two towering wooden doors, their imposing presence blocking entry into the heart of the city.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Thick stone walls loom high into the air, a formidable barrier against any would-be intruders.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (People from across the kingdom have gathered here, seeking entry into the magnificent capital of Lusteria.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Adventurers must pay a toll of 5 gold to enter the capital.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I have no choice but to do some quests...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's head back to the world map for now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (There are probably some available quests in the starting area.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_1_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should check the Pristine Forest?)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_2_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Adventurers must pay a toll of 5 gold coins to enter the capital.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_2_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Welcome to the capital of Lusteria!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_2_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (New location: You have unlocked the capital!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_2_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (From now on you can travel directly to the capital by selecting it on the map.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_2_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Then stop wasting my time and get out of the way!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_120_2_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I have no choice but to pay the toll.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Towering trees stand sentinel, their verdant canopies reaching skyward to create a natural cathedral of green.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Sunlight filters through the leaves, dappling the forest floor with specks of gold.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (The air is alive with the symphony of chirping birds and rustling leaves.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Known for their skill with a bow and their incredible lewdness.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: These woods are infested with rabid squirrels.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: If you slay 20 of them, I will reward you handsomely.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (Accept this quest? Note: Attempting this quest will take one hour.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Very well. You will find the rabid squirrels deeper into the forest.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Return to me when you have completed your task.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess it's time to go squirrel hunting.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_16
TranslationLabels.Text: You journey deep inside the forest...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_17
TranslationLabels.Text: You find yourself surrounded by dark, ominous-looking trees. The hairs on the back of your neck stand up.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_18
TranslationLabels.Text: There is evil here. You can feel its eyes upon you.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (Okay, I killed 20 of those nasty critters.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_23
TranslationLabels.Text: I sense that the balance of the forest has been restored.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Well done, here is your reward.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just like before, she disappears into the shadows.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (I should be able to enter the capital now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's go back to the city gates.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_41
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I'll just have to leave and start the quest over.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_50
TranslationLabels.Text: Then you must leave these woods at once!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (You do as the sexy Elf tells you.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_53
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I'll have to complete that quest to continue.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_1_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (Nice! Let's return to the world map.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just like before, the elf huntress approaches you.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (The Elf Huntress is nowhere to be seen.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_110_3_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I can only do the quest once a day.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_100_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't go to the capital yet.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_100_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to get through the city gates first.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_100_10_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't think Annabelle is online right now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_100_100_10_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (If I want to meet up with her, I should probably check in the evening.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_140_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maid outfit: unlocks new scenes with Victoria.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_140_1_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder if I can get Victoria to wear this somehow...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Pink lingerie: unlocks new scenes with Olivia.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Red lingerie: unlocks new scenes with Annabelle.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_2_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I bet this would look great on Annabelle.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Black lingerie: unlocks new scenes with Victoria.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_3_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (But seeing Victoria wearing this will be more than worth it.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_4_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Blue lingerie: unlocks new scenes with Madeline.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_4_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (Holy crap! Why is this so expensive?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_130_4_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (I just hope Madeline will like it...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Men's workout apparel: required for fitness and boxing workouts.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Women's workout apparel: unlocks new scenes with Annabelle.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_2_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm sure I'll be able to put this to good use...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_5_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Protein: Increases stat gain of fitness workouts by 100%.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_6_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Jumprope: Increases stat gain of boxing workouts by 100%.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_7_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (A women's workout outfit catches your eye.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_110_7_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I bet that would look so sexy on Annabelle...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_120_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Micro bikini: unlocks new scenes with Annabelle.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_120_2_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (That's a hefty price tag for such a tiny piece of cloth.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_120_2_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I have the feeling it will be money well spent...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_120_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Sling bikini: unlocks new scenes with Madeline.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_7_120_4_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Swimming goggles: Increases stat gain of swimming workouts by 100%.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_160_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll go put on my swim trunks.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_160_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you walk into the back yard, you notice Annabelle.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_160_3_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Wow! That's the first time I've seen her at the pool.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_160_3_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems our little chat had the effect I was hoping for.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_440_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll change into my workout outfit and glove up.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_440_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (It feels so good to let loose every now and then!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_440_2_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Nothing like a good post-workout muscle burn!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_300_7_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I think I've played enough video games for today.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_270_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you enter the hallway, you see Victoria in some very skimpy shorts...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_270_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (She kept up her end of the deal...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_270_1_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (...but I didn't expect her to do it wearing...that!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (You see a group of people gathered around two men who are fighting.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Among the crowd, you spot Ruslan and Sergei.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_5
TranslationLabels.Text: I see you made it here after all...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Did curiousity get the better of you?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Or did you decide you could use some easy money?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (An eagerness shines in his good eye.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: I take it you are here to fight?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_101
TranslationLabels.Text: There is only rule of this..."fight club".

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_102
TranslationLabels.Text: Let me guess...we don't talk about it?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_104
TranslationLabels.Text: How would we get new people to join if we don't talk about it?!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_105
TranslationLabels.Text: The rule is: always make sure your fingernails are clipped.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_106
TranslationLabels.Text: We don't want someone to...lose an eye.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_203
TranslationLabels.Text: Come back any time you're up for another fight.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_301
TranslationLabels.Text: You might want to consider training a bit more.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_9_100_1_903
TranslationLabels.Text: (He walks back to his spot next to Sergei and continues watching the fight.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_100_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Isn't that the same guy who came into my apartment?)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (If you didn't know any better, you would think he was auditioning for a role as a villian, in a low-budget James Bond movie.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (And you don't want to make an enemy out of him.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_8
TranslationLabels.Text: You have some balls coming here, I'll give you that...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Especially after that little stunt you pulled with my...employee.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: You're lucky I didn't send Sergei here instead...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_11
TranslationLabels.Text: It wouldn't have ended well for you, right Sergei?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (The big man just grins without even looking at you.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_13
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm here to pay off my debt.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_17
TranslationLabels.Text: I pay you the $40,000 I owe you and you stop sending your goons after me...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_19
TranslationLabels.Text: If you meant to say $50,000, we have a deal.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_22
TranslationLabels.Text: No...we agreed that you would pay me back within 6 months.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_24
TranslationLabels.Text: So naturally, like any other...respectable businessman, I have to charge additional interest.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, these types of deals are hardly ever fair.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (I knew what I was getting myself into when I took his money.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (Besides, he has a point...I didn't pay him back within the agreed time.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess it's back to being broke for me.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_33
TranslationLabels.Text: It's been a pleasure doing business with you, [NAME_1].

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wish I could say the same.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_35
TranslationLabels.Text: As a matter of fact...I have another business proposal for you.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_37
TranslationLabels.Text: Come now, at least hear me out first.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_38
TranslationLabels.Text: It'll be easy money for someone like you.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_39
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm sure whatever it is, it isn't legal.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_41
TranslationLabels.Text: I am an upstanding businessman, after all.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_43
TranslationLabels.Text: This is merely a small...entertainment business I run on the side.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_45
TranslationLabels.Text: The winner gets paid, simple as that.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_47
TranslationLabels.Text: There is nothing shady about it!

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_48
TranslationLabels.Text: (That has shady written all over it!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_49
TranslationLabels.Text: Thanks for the offer, but like I said...I'm not interested.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_51
TranslationLabels.Text: If you ever change your mind...

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_52
TranslationLabels.Text: Come to the Mega Mall Parking Garage any day at 22:00.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_55
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have other matters I need to attend to.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_57
TranslationLabels.Text: (You leave Ruslan's office, feeling relieved to finally be debt-free.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_58
TranslationLabels.Text: (Ahh! It feels like a weight has been lifted off my shoulders.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_59
TranslationLabels.Text: (Too bad I don't have any cash left over...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_60
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I guess I'll just wait until this job is finished.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_61
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's not like I need the money right now, anyway.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_1_65
TranslationLabels.Text: (I could probably buy some useful things over there.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (He doesn't even acknowledge your presence and just stares ahead blankly.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_8_110_2_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Yeah, it's obvious that he isn't here for his conversational skills.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe a "toilet emergency" would get Kate to leave Annabelle's room.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I'll just jerk off for a bit, since I need to get hard...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_76
TranslationLabels.Text: (And for a moment, you get lost in her beautiful, big green eyes.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (Giving you an even better look at her beautiful, big breasts.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, with my father just having passed away...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems she's not comfortable talking to me about it.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_58
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I'm still not used to the idea of having three [REL_S1+].)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_7
TranslationLabels.Text: She started working for Madeline only recently. She seems to be quite reserved but friendly.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_45
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah. Miss Caine hired me to escort her and the girls to their appointments.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Sure, what do you want to know?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her current location is some place called "The Pervy Pixie".)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_232
TranslationLabels.Text: But I do appreciate a nice red.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_14
TranslationLabels.Text: And even when I need to-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_45
TranslationLabels.Text: Knowing full well what would happen if she did.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_85
TranslationLabels.Text: Kate? She has only been with us for a short while.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_102
TranslationLabels.Text: I convinced my father he was wrong about him.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_126
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm sorry for how my father treated you...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_184
TranslationLabels.Text: However, our [REL_FAM] highly values privacy, and the constant presence of the police is rather...inconvenient.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_190
TranslationLabels.Text: He also asked me why I hadn’t contacted my [REL_SS1] about this. Who, in his words, "is a security specialist, after all".

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_200
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes. Your father and I have three [REL_D1+].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_201
TranslationLabels.Text: Wait! So that means I have...three [REL_S1+]?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_205
TranslationLabels.Text: I run a highly exclusive mentoring program that teaches young women to become successful in life.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_206
TranslationLabels.Text: There are currently three girls in this program.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_207
TranslationLabels.Text: They will be residing here at the mansion for the duration of the program and are under my supervision and care.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_212
TranslationLabels.Text: (So much for being welcomed into the [REL_FAM]...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_213
TranslationLabels.Text: You would be required to escort the girls to their club practices and accompany me to board meetings.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_218
TranslationLabels.Text: Besides, as a professional bodyguard, it would be unethical to accept a contract protecting someone with a personal relationship to my father.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_223
TranslationLabels.Text: Also, it will give you the chance to get to know your...[REL_S1+].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_241
TranslationLabels.Text: There is nothing more important to me than the girls.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_249
TranslationLabels.Text: As I mentioned earlier, privacy is of utmost importance to us.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_250
TranslationLabels.Text: It is also crucial that you respect that and <highlight>refrain from interfering</highlight> in [REL_FM].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_269
TranslationLabels.Text: Just so you know, I have already told the girls about you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_282
TranslationLabels.Text: Is it really true that you are our [REL_B2]?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_304
TranslationLabels.Text: But, [REL_M2]...can’t you see he’s just after your money? Please tell me you don’t believe-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_323
TranslationLabels.Text: (She seems to be very strict with her [REL_D1+].)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_338
TranslationLabels.Text: (Why do I get the feeling that Madeline doesn't want me to get to know my [REL_S1+] at all?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_351
TranslationLabels.Text: You should be grateful that Miss Caine would even offer the likes of you an opportunity to work for this [REL_FAM]!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_357
TranslationLabels.Text: Look, I can see that you are very committed to this [REL_FAM], and I can assure you that I am a professional, just like you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_17
TranslationLabels.Text: I must have watched it like a zillion times.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_60
TranslationLabels.Text: You will expose yourself to the youngest [REL_D1].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_19
TranslationLabels.Text: This time you will expose yourself to the middle [REL_D1]…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_11
TranslationLabels.Text: I think [REL_M2] is feeling a bit left out.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_37
TranslationLabels.Text: Haha! What about the [REL_S2] you always dreamed of?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (I just found out this girl is my [REL_S2]!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_72
TranslationLabels.Text: And I know [REL_M2] and my [REL_S2+] might seem a bit...unfriendly...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (Could it be that she's just playing a prank on her [REL_B2]?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_121_113
TranslationLabels.Text: *Whisper* If Rebecca would have caught you in here, [REL_M4] would fire me in a hearbeat!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_121_118
TranslationLabels.Text: *Whisper* But that means you can't do anything that would get me in trouble with [REL_M4].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_200_3
TranslationLabels.Text: It’s so cool that I have a [REL_B2] now!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_200_73
TranslationLabels.Text: You know, with what happened to [REL_F4] and all...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course! I can't keep my [REL_S2] waiting, now can I?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (It’s really cute that she’s so excited about having a [REL_B2].)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_107
TranslationLabels.Text: You're pretty good at this [REL_B2] thing.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_32
TranslationLabels.Text: He’s probably just some driver her mentor hired for her little princess.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_903_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (She gets out of the car and goes inside the mansion.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_6
TranslationLabels.Text: She has been in the employ of the [REL_FAM] for many years, and seems to genuinely care for Madeline and the girls.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_r_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm keeping my eye on him. I'm not going to let him hurt the girls.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_r_1
TranslationLabels.Text: There's no way that asshole is who he says he is!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_29
TranslationLabels.Text: I wonder how [REL_M2] will feel about that...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_30
TranslationLabels.Text: About what? Her [REL_D1] acting like a spoiled brat that is too lazy to get her own drink?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_51
TranslationLabels.Text: It means she won't be coming back to your sorry ass anymore.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_910_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (She gets out without saying a word.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_15
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't bother. The door to the disc-

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_23
TranslationLabels.Text: You are not to interfere in any [REL_FM].

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_not_extracted
TranslationLabels.Text: ACCESS ERROR: Make sure the game is extracted to a directory with write permission.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 存取錯誤：確保遊戲被提取到具有寫入權限的目錄。

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_select_color
TranslationLabels.Text:
Please select a <highlight>UI color</highlight>.
(Note: you can change this at any time in the settings).
TranslationLabels.Translation:
請選擇<highlight>UI 顏色</highlight>。
（注意：您可以隨時在設定中變更此設定）。

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_no_hint_mc
TranslationLabels.Text: There is nothing specific I need to do right now.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我現在沒有什麼具體需要做的。

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_no_hint_girl
TranslationLabels.Text: There is nothing I can do to improve my relationship with her right now.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我現在無能為力改善我和她的關係。

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_unsaved_progress_warning
TranslationLabels.Translation: 未儲存的進度將會遺失！

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_choice_locked
TranslationLabels.Text: HINT: Some interactions will require you to complete certain conditions to unlock.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 提示：某些互動需要您完成某些條件才能解鎖。

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_topic_locked
TranslationLabels.Text: HINT: Some topics will require you to complete certain conditions to unlock.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 提示：某些主題將要求您完成某些條件才能解鎖。

TranslationLabels.Label: ui_bonus_content_unlock
TranslationLabels.Text: Bonus content is only available in the premium version.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 獎勵內容僅在高級版本中提供。

TranslationLabels.Label: bonus_content
TranslationLabels.Text: This content is unlocked in the extra version
TranslationLabels.Translation: 此內容在額外版本中解鎖

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_mouse_interactions_1
TranslationLabels.Text:
During dialogs, a <highlight>mouse interaction</highlight> may appear.
When the mouse interaction icon pops up, move your mouse as indicated by the animation to advance the scene.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
在對話過程中，可能會出現<highlight>滑鼠互動</highlight>。
當滑鼠互動圖示彈出時，按照動畫指示移動滑鼠以推進場景。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_mouse_interactions_2
TranslationLabels.Text: But make sure you complete the interactions before the <highlight>timer</highlight> runs out, or there may be consequences!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但請確保在<highlight>計時器</highlight>耗盡之前完成交互，否則可能會產生後果！

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_dialog_choices_1
TranslationLabels.Text: During dialogs, you may be presented with multiple <highlight>choices</highlight> on how to respond.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在對話過程中，您可能會看到多個關於如何回應的<highlight>選擇</highlight>。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_dialog_choices_2
TranslationLabels.Text: It is important to choose wisely, as your reaction may affect the outcome of the dialog as well as your <highlight>relationship</highlight> with the person you are talking to.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 明智的選擇很重要，因為您的反應可能會影響對話的結果以及您與談話對象的<highlight>關係</highlight>。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_dialog_choices_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Some choices will remain locked until specific conditions are met.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 某些選擇將保持鎖定狀態，直到滿足特定條件。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_character_stats_1
TranslationLabels.Text:
Each of the main girls has the following two stats:
<highlight>love</highlight> and <highlight>lust</highlight>.

These stats reflect your current <highlight>relationship</highlight> with them.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
每個主要女孩都有以下兩個統計數據：
<highlight>愛</highlight>和<highlight>慾望</highlight>。

這些統計數據反映了您當前與她們的<highlight>關係</highlight>。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_character_stats_2
TranslationLabels.Text:
You can increase their stats by making the right choices during dialogs and gaining their approval.

Be careful, if you say or do something a character doesn't approve of, her stats will decrease.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
您可以透過在對話中做出正確的選擇並獲得他們的認可來增加他們的統計數據。

請小心，如果您說了或做了一些角色不認可的事情，她的統計數據將會減少。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_map_1
TranslationLabels.Text:
[180|715|-375]You can use the <highlight>navigation arrows</highlight> on screen to move around.
However, if you want to save some time, you can also use the <highlight>map</highlight>.

This allows you to easily travel to different locations.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
[180|715|-375]您可以使用螢幕上的<highlight>導航箭頭</highlight>來移動。
但是，如果您想節省一些時間，您也可以使用<highlight>地圖</highlight>. 

這使您可以輕鬆前往不同的地點。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_map_2
TranslationLabels.Text: [180|715|-375]Go ahead and open the map, and select your apartment on the city tab.
TranslationLabels.Translation: [180|715|-375]繼續打開地圖，然後在城市標籤上選擇您的公寓。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_dialog_topics_1
TranslationLabels.Text:
During some dialogs, you will be presented with multiple <highlight>topics</highlight>.
Talking about certain topics can help you increase your relationship with that character.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
在某些對話中，您將看到多個<highlight>主題</highlight>。
談論某些主題可以幫助您增進與該角色的關係。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_dialog_topics_2
TranslationLabels.Text:
You can pick up to 3 topics to talk about, before the conversation ends.

If you want to end it before that, click the X on the top right of the screen.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
在對話結束之前，您最多可以選擇 3 個主題進行討論。

如果您想在此之前結束對話，請點擊螢幕右上角的 X。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_dialog_topics_3
TranslationLabels.Text:
When they have nothing new to say about a topic, it will be grayed out.

But remember to check back every now and then, as the story progresses characters may offer you important new information.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
當他們對某個主題沒有什麼新內容可說時，該主題將呈灰色顯示。

但請記住時不時地回來查看，隨著故事的進展，角色可能會為您提供重要的新信息。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_spy_intro_1
TranslationLabels.Text: You have unlocked the option to spy on the girls using the hidden corridors.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您已經解鎖了使用隱藏走廊監視女孩的選項。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_spy_travel_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Click on any of the spy icons to travel directly to the corresponding air vent.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 點擊任何間諜圖示即可直接前往相應的通風口。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_spy_travel_2
TranslationLabels.Text: This will allow you to spy on the selected room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這將允許您監視所選的房間。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_spy_travel_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Spying on the girls at specific times will unlock new content and progress the main story.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在特定時間監視女孩將解鎖新內容並推進主要故事。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_spy_travel_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Rememer to keep an eye on the hints if you ever need help.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果您需要協助，請記得留意提示。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_fights_1
TranslationLabels.Text:
During fights, arrow icons will move down the middle of the screen.
Press the corresponding arrow on your keyboard when the icon is in the highlighted area to hit your opponent.

But be careful, if you fail to press the correct key at the right time, your opponent will hit you instead.
TranslationLabels.Translation:
戰鬥時，箭頭圖示會向下移動到螢幕中間。
當圖示位於突出顯示區域時，按下鍵盤上相應的箭頭即可擊中對手。

但要小心，如果你沒有按下正確的鍵在適當的時候，你的對手就會攻擊你。

TranslationLabels.Label: tc_fights_2
TranslationLabels.Text:
If you press the key when the arrow is in the center of the highligted area, you will score a perfect hit and your combo counter will increase.
The higher your combo is, the more damage you will deal with each hit.

Take down your opponent by scoring big combos and avoid getting hit!
TranslationLabels.Translation:
如果箭頭位於突出顯示區域的中心時按下該鍵，您將獲得完美命中，並且您的連擊計數器將會增加。
您的連擊越高，每次擊中造成的傷害就越大。

透過連擊擊倒對手並避免被擊中！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Annabelle seems to be a very timid girl. But maybe you just need to get to know her a bit better...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 安娜貝爾看起來是一個非常膽怯的女孩。但也許你只是需要更了解她......

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_1
TranslationLabels.Text: She takes her showers in the morning. I have to make sure I'll be in the upstairs bathroom before she gets there.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她早上洗澡。我必須確保在她到達之前我能到達樓上的浴室。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_2
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her art classes on Friday at 19:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要在星期五 19:00 帶她去上藝術課。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I can find out a bit more about her by talking to one of the other girls?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我可以透過與其他女孩交談來更多地了解她？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe one of the girls has a spare laptop I could borrow?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許其中一個女孩有一台備用筆記型電腦我可以藉用？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_5
TranslationLabels.Text: I saw her going into the study, carrying an old book.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我看見她拿著一本舊書走進書房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should focus on the other girls for now?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我現在應該把注意力集中在其他女孩身上？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_7
TranslationLabels.Text: She works out late in the afternoon.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她在下午晚些時候鍛煉身體。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_8
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should join the girls for dinner?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該和女孩們一起吃晚餐？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Olivia promised me she would leave her laptop in my room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 奧莉維亞答應我她會把筆記型電腦留在我的房間裡。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_10
TranslationLabels.Text: I should try installing Hentai Impact on the laptop.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該嘗試在筆記型電腦上安裝 Hentai Impact。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_11
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I can find a way to get into her room when Kate is cleaning it?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我可以在凱特打掃房間時想辦法進入她的房間？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Do you really want me to spell it out? Use the toilet roll on the toilet!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你真的要我把它拼出來嗎？上廁所時使用衛生紙！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_14
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her art classes again, on Friday at 19:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要在周五 19:00 再次帶她去上藝術課。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_15
TranslationLabels.Text: I could spy on her when she takes her morning bath.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她早上洗澡時我可以監視她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I promised Madeline I would help Annabelle with her workout.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我答應瑪德琳我會幫助安娜貝爾鍛鍊身體。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_17
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to wait for Olivia to tell me what she wants in return for the laptop.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要等待奧莉維亞告訴我她想要什麼來換取筆記型電腦。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_18
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should focus on Olivia for a bit.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該關註一下奧利維亞。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_19
TranslationLabels.Text: If she doesn't feel like working out, I should cut her some slack.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果她不想鍛煉，我就應該讓她放鬆一下。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_20
TranslationLabels.Text: I should cover for her during dinner.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 晚餐時我應該替她掩護。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I shouldn't lie for her during dinner.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我不應該在晚餐時為她撒謊。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_h_22
TranslationLabels.Text: I should spy on her and Madeline at midnight.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該在午夜監視她和瑪德琳。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_r_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I hope he doesn't talk to me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我希望他不要跟我說話。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_r_2
TranslationLabels.Text: At least he seems to be friendly.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I guess that was the point.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (You put the towel over your head just like you did with Olivia.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你把毛巾放在頭上，就像對待奧莉維亞一樣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_17
TranslationLabels.Text: T-The door was open! I...I thought-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (She runs out of the bathroom and quickly closes the door.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I feel like an asshole for doing that to her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我覺得自己對她這樣做是個混蛋。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (You put your clothes back on and leave the bathroom.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you walk past Annabelle's bedroom, you hear a sound coming from inside.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你走過安娜貝爾的臥室時，你聽到裡面有聲音。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (Crap! I didn't think she'd be that upset...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （糟糕！我沒想到她會這麼不高興…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (You press your ear against the door.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_34
TranslationLabels.Translation: 同時，安娜貝爾的房間裡…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (So, the shy girl has a naughty side as well...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （原來害羞的女孩也有頑皮的一面…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (Anyway, I better get out of here, before someone sees me.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無論如何，我最好在有人看到我之前離開這裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_101_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (She blushes and avoids making eye contact with you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她臉紅了，避免與你目光接觸。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_101_5
TranslationLabels.Text: So, any big plans for today?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，今天有什麼大計畫嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_101_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (She seems uncomfortable talking to you, so you decide to leave her alone.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她似乎不願意和你說話，所以你決定讓她一個人呆著。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_101_10
TranslationLabels.Translation: 正確的。嗯...祝你今天愉快。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_102_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (She seems to be focused on her studies.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_102_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I shouldn't be bothering her right now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Annabelle is staring dreamily into the distance.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （安娜貝爾如夢似幻地凝視著遠方。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (She startles, snapping out of her thoughts.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! Uhm, no, I was just...thinking.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, my bad. I didn't mean to interrupt you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦，我的錯。我不是故意打擾你的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_8
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, I’ll leave you to it then.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧，那我就讓你自己解決吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (You notice a familiar looking book under Annabelle's arm.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你注意到安娜貝爾腋下夾著一本看起來很熟悉的書。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (Is that...one of the books of sin?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_16
TranslationLabels.Text: Hey Annabelle, sorry to bother you...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嘿安娜貝爾，抱歉打擾你...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_17
TranslationLabels.Text: But I noticed that book you have there.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我注意到你那裡有那本書。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah. I was wondering if I could maybe borrow it?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的。我想知道我是否可以藉用它？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_22
TranslationLabels.Text: If it's not too much trouble?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Don't tell me she actually reads this stuff?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （難道她真的讀過這些東西嗎？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_103_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (Great! I'm one step closer to finding out what that bookcase is hiding.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （太棒了！我距離找出書櫃裡藏著什麼又更近了一步。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_104_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Annabelle is so focused on her painting that she doesn’t even notice you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （安娜貝爾如此專注於她的畫，她甚至沒有註意到你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_104_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (She clearly isn't comfortable with you watching her paint.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她顯然對你看她的畫感到不舒服。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_104_9
TranslationLabels.Translation: 正確的。我會讓你獨自一人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (But her gaze wanders as she just sits on the bench, not actively exercising.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但她只是坐在長凳上，目光遊離，沒有積極鍛鍊。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (As soon as she sees you, she suddenly starts working out.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她一看到你，就突然開始運動。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Knowing she is obviously faking it, you suppress a smile.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （知道她明顯是裝的，你忍住笑意。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_16
TranslationLabels.Text: Hey, would you like to work out together?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_19
TranslationLabels.Text: It looks like you just started, so I might as well join you, right?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 看起來你才剛開始，所以我也加入你吧？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_20
TranslationLabels.Translation: 除非……你不需要我的幫助——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_21
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不、不！我的意思是……我願意！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Cool. Let me get changed and I'll be back in 5 minutes.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 涼爽的。讓我換身衣服，五分鐘後再回來。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_26
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嘿，準備好我們的鍛鍊了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_28
TranslationLabels.Text: Actually, I'm feeling a bit sore today...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_32
TranslationLabels.Text: We can work out together some other time.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們可以改天一起運動。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_35
TranslationLabels.Text: That's all part of the process, Annabelle.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這就是整個過程的一部分，安娜貝爾。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_36
TranslationLabels.Text: But you have to push through if you want to see the results.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但如果你想看到結果，就必須堅持到底。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_39
TranslationLabels.Text: All right then. I'll go get changed.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Let's get those muscles nice and warm.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 讓我們讓這些肌肉變得漂亮和溫暖。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_45
TranslationLabels.Text: A good warm-up will help to prevent injuries.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 良好的熱身有助於防止受傷。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_46
TranslationLabels.Text: So make sure never to skip it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以請確保永遠不要跳過它。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_49
TranslationLabels.Text: (To get your heart rate up a bit.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then you do some sit-ups with her...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （然後你和她一起做仰臥起坐…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_58
TranslationLabels.Text: Come on, you can do it!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_59
TranslationLabels.Text: (After that you focus on her back muscles...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （之後你的注意力集中在她的背部肌肉上...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_63
TranslationLabels.Text: Exhale when you pull the weight down.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當你把重物拉下來時呼氣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_84
TranslationLabels.Text: (Suddenly, you realize you're not only staring at her boobs, but you stopped talking as well...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （突然，你意識到你不僅盯著她的胸部，而且你也停止說話了......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (You feel your cheeks flush and quickly meet her eyes.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你感到臉頰通紅，很快就與她的目光對視。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_87
TranslationLabels.Text: (It looks like she didn't notice you staring...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （看來她沒有註意到你的目光…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_88
TranslationLabels.Text: (For a brief moment, you see a slight smile on her face.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有那麼一會兒，你會看到她臉上掛著一絲微笑。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_98
TranslationLabels.Text: I really appreciate you helping me out like this...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我真的很感謝你這樣幫助我......

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_105_99
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't mention it, it's my pleasure!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_5
TranslationLabels.Text: At first, the thought of having a [REL_B1] made me a bit...nervous.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 起初，擁有 [REL_B1] 的想法讓我有點…緊張。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_6
TranslationLabels.Text: But now that I'm getting to know you better, I really like it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但現在我越來越了解你了，我真的很喜歡它。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_7
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我很高興聽到這個消息。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_8
TranslationLabels.Text: And I'm glad I got to know you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_10
TranslationLabels.Text: We don't really spend a lot of time together...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們在一起的時間其實不多...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_14
TranslationLabels.Text: There isn't much to tell you...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_21
TranslationLabels.Text: I think it's so cool when someone is artistic.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我認為當一個人有藝​​術天賦時真是太酷了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_23
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然！太令人印象深刻了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_24
TranslationLabels.Text: I can't even draw a decent stick figure...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我連一個像樣的簡筆畫都畫不了…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_26
TranslationLabels.Text: And who doesn't love video games?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_27
TranslationLabels.Text: Life would be so boring without them.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果沒有他們，生活將會多麼無趣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_29
TranslationLabels.Text: Uhm...I don't think she really likes me...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 呃……我覺得她不是真的喜歡我…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_31
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, she doesn't really talk to me a lot...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_32
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe it's because we are so unalike?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許是因為我們太不一樣了？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_33
TranslationLabels.Text: She works out a lot and she's very active on social media.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她經常鍛煉，在社交媒體上也非常活躍。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_34
TranslationLabels.Text: And she's super confident...she loves posting selfies...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 而且她超有自信……她喜歡發自拍照……

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_38
TranslationLabels.Text: I admire her a lot, she's so smart and successful...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我很佩服她，她很聰明，很成功…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_39
TranslationLabels.Text: And she's teaching us how to be like her.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她正在教我們如何像她一樣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_40
TranslationLabels.Text: She's also very supportive of my art!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她也非常支持我的藝術！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_41
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, she can be a bit strict sometimes...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，她有時也會嚴格一些…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_42
TranslationLabels.Text: But that's just for our own benefit.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但這只是為了我們自己的利益。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_43
TranslationLabels.Translation: 老實說……我幾乎不認識他。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_44
TranslationLabels.Text: All he ever cared about was his company...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他最關心的就是他的陪伴…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_46
TranslationLabels.Text: I know it's her job, but she always looks after us.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我知道這是她的工作，但她總是照顧我們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_47
TranslationLabels.Text: And I think she likes it too.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_48
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't really know her yet.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_200_49
TranslationLabels.Text: She only started working here one day before you came.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她在你來之前一天才開始在這裡工作。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (It will probably take me a few hours to get everything set up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我可能需要幾個小時才能完成所有設定。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_2_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't have time for that right now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (All right, let's see if I can if get this to work...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好吧，讓我們看看是否可以讓它發揮作用...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (Yes! I actually got it to run!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (Now, let's see what this game is all about...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （現在，讓我們看看這個遊戲到底是怎麼回事...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, there's a human, an orc and a demon.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，有一個人類，一個獸人和一個惡魔。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh, apparently you can unlock more avatar choices in their shop.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （哦，顯然你可以在他們的商店解鎖更多頭像選擇。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess that explains how they make money...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想這解釋了他們如何賺錢...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_19
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你令人興奮的冒險現在開始！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_21
TranslationLabels.Text: But first, we'll show you a quick tutorial so you can learn the basics.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但首先，我們將向您展示一個快速教程，以便您可以學習基礎知識。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's a lot bigger than I expected...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (How am I ever going to find Annabelle?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (I have no idea where to go...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (And there's no point in running around aimlessly.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （漫無目的地跑來跑去是沒有意義的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (Besides, this took up way too much of my time already.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （此外，這已經佔用了我太多的時間。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to find out what Annabelle's character is called.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我需要找出安娜貝爾的角色叫什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_33
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can sneak into her room and have a look, when she's not around?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以趁她不在的時候偷偷溜進她的房間看看？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_300_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess it will have to wait.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_301_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Before I can continue playing, I need to find out what Annabelle's character is called.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （在繼續玩之前，我需要找出安娜貝爾的角色叫什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_301_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can sneak into her room and have a look, when she's not around?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以趁她不在的時候偷偷溜進她的房間看看？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh! Annabelle is taking her morning bath...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_6
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她為我帶來了一場精彩的表演。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (You have unlocked Annabelle's naked paperdoll animation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （您已經解鎖了安娜貝爾的裸體紙娃娃動畫。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (She leans back with a sigh and closes her eyes...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她向後靠去，嘆了口氣，閉上了眼睛……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (Anyway, I shouldn't stay in here too long.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無論如何，我不應該在這裡待太久。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't want to risk getting caught.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_400_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (You leave the corridor and return to the utility closet.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline is standing in front of some kind of wooden contraption.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳站在某種木製裝置前。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, what should I do with you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，我該對你做什麼呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_8
TranslationLabels.Text: I think I deserve to be punished...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我覺得我應該要受到懲罰...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_10
TranslationLabels.Text: And what kind of punishment would be fitting, in your opinion?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您認為什麼樣的懲罰才是適當的？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_14
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh? You think you have been that bad, have you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦？你以為你已經那麼糟了，是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I should know better than lying to you, [REL_M3].
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該比對你撒謊更清楚，[REL_M3]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_17
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的。你當然應該這麼做。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline walks over to a rack filled with straps and paddles.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳走到一個裝滿皮帶和槳的架子上。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (She carefully examines each item hanging on the rack, her gaze lingering thoughtfully on each one.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她仔細檢查掛在架子上的每一件物品，目光若有所思地在每一件物品上徘徊。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks so hot in that leather outfit...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她穿那件皮衣看起來很性感...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_23
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes, this one will do nicely.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (She removes one of the leather paddles…)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_27
TranslationLabels.Text: I have picked the perfect tool for your punishment.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我已經為你選擇了完美的懲罰工具。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (She presses the paddle against Annabelle's chin.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她把槳按在安娜貝爾的下巴上。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (She forces Annabelle's head up with the paddle.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她用槳迫使安娜貝爾抬起頭。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_32
TranslationLabels.Text: Look at me when I am talking to you!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我跟你說話的時候看著我！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_34
TranslationLabels.Text: *Scoffs* It seems I have to teach you some manners as well.
TranslationLabels.Translation: *嘲笑*看來我也得教你一些禮儀了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline walks around to the other side of the contraption.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_37
TranslationLabels.Text: Let this be a lesson to you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 讓這成為你的一個教訓。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_39
TranslationLabels.Text: (And forcefully slaps Annabelle's ass with it.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （並用力拍打安娜貝爾的屁股。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (After a while, Madeline stops spanking Annabelle...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （過了一會兒，瑪德琳不再打安娜貝爾的屁股了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_48
TranslationLabels.Text: That will be enough for today.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_49
TranslationLabels.Text: I trust you will improve your behavior?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我相信你會改善你的行為？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_53
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, let's get you out of this.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，讓我們幫您擺脫困境。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll get back to my room before they leave...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我會在他們離開之前回到我的房間...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_62
TranslationLabels.Text: (And kind of hot...if I'm being honest.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （而且有點熱……如果我說實話的話。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_63
TranslationLabels.Text: (It feels wrong, but I can't help but being turned on by what I just saw...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （感覺不對，但我忍不住被眼前的景象所吸引……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_64
TranslationLabels.Translation: （先是奧莉維亞，現在是安娜貝爾…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_65
TranslationLabels.Text: (And somehow knowing that I played a part in them being punished...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不知何故知道我在他們受到懲罰中發揮了作用...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_66
TranslationLabels.Text: (It just turns me on even more.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_68
TranslationLabels.Text: (This doesn't even come close to normal.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_71
TranslationLabels.Text: (And Annabelle seemed a bit turned on as well, if anything.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （安娜貝爾似乎也有點興奮，如果有的話。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_72
TranslationLabels.Text: (Wait...is that why she lied during dinner?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （等等……這就是她在晚餐時撒謊的原因嗎？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_75
TranslationLabels.Text: (There's definitely something strange going on here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這裡肯定發生了一些奇怪的事情。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_401_76
TranslationLabels.Text: (And I really don't know what to make of all this...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我真的不知道該怎麼辦這一切......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Are you ready to go to your art class?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你準備好去上藝術課了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_7
TranslationLabels.Translation: *悶悶不樂*喔！是-是的...我馬上就到！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (Come to think of it, she's hardly said more than a few words to me since we've met.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （想想看，自從我們見面以來，她幾乎沒有對我說過幾句話。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (She just stays locked up in her room most of the time.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （大部分時間她只是把自己關在房間裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can imagine she's upset and would rather be alone.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我可以想像她很沮喪，寧願一個人待著。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (Of course, seeing me naked probably didn't help much either...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當然，看到我裸體可能也沒有多大幫助...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's see if I can get her to open up a bit.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Are you looking forward to going to art class again?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你期待再次上美術課嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Did you forget I was taking you?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_26
TranslationLabels.Text: You seemed a bit surprised earlier...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_27
TranslationLabels.Text: When I came to pick you up?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_30
TranslationLabels.Text: I guess I lost track of time...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should just give it some time.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm sure she'll open up once she gets to know me a bit better.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我確信一旦她對我有了更多的了解，她就會敞開心扉。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_43
TranslationLabels.Text: All right then. I'll be waiting here.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那好吧。我會在這裡等你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Let me get the door for you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (She should be out any minute now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she comes down the stairs you can't help but admire her curvy body.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她走下樓梯時，你會情不自禁地欣賞她曲線優美的身體。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_63
TranslationLabels.Text: Great! Let's get you home then.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 偉大的！那我們送你回家吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_66
TranslationLabels.Text: (Or is she this quiet with everyone?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （或者她對每個人都這麼安靜嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_67
TranslationLabels.Text: So, how was your art class?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，你的美術課怎麼樣呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_70
TranslationLabels.Text: (You echo her silence in an attempt to get more out of her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你回應她的沉默，試圖從她那裡得到更多資訊。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_73
TranslationLabels.Text: *Softly* The teacher said I showed talent...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_77
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe you'll be a famous painter one day!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許有一天你會成為一位著名的畫家！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_78
TranslationLabels.Text: *Softly* Oh, I don't know about that...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_80
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, at least I got her talking...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_81
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's not much, but it's a start.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_82
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I'll just have to take it one step at a time with her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我只需要和她一起一步一步地走下去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_87
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't mention it! It was my-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_88
TranslationLabels.Text: (Before you can finish your sentence, she gets out of the car and goes inside.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你還沒把話說完，她就下車走了進去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_91
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, it seems she went straight back to her room.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_95
TranslationLabels.Text: (Now that I think about it...I wonder what she's doing in there all the time?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （現在想想……我不知道她一直在那裡做什麼？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_96
TranslationLabels.Text: (If I could learn what her hobbies are, it might help me get closer to her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果我能了解她的愛好是什麼，可能會幫助我更接近她。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_900_97
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can find out a bit more about her by talking to the other girls?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以透過和其他女孩交談來了解更多關於她的資訊？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Are you ready to go to your art class?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你準備好去上藝術課了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just like the first time, silence fills the air.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （就像第一次一樣，空氣中一片寂靜。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe some small talk will loosen her up a bit.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許有些閒聊會讓她放鬆一點。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_11
TranslationLabels.Text: So, are you looking forward to art class?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_14
TranslationLabels.Text: I just hope my teacher won't be upset with me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我只希望我的老師不要生我的氣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_15
TranslationLabels.Text: Upset? What makes you think that?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 沮喪的？什麼讓你有那個想法？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I'm not cut out to be an artist after all...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我根本不是一個適合當藝術家的人…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (Last week she was so excited because the teacher said she had talent.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （上週她很興奮，因為老師說她有天賦。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder what made her doubt herself like this.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想知道是什麼讓她這樣懷疑自己。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_26
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe you should just talk to your teacher about this.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許你應該和你的老師談談這件事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_27
TranslationLabels.Text: And explain why this is so difficult for you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 並解釋為什麼這對你來說如此困難。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_29
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course. You're still learning, right?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_30
TranslationLabels.Text: And your teacher said you have a talent for this.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你的老師說你有這方面的天賦。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_31
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm sure he'll try to help you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我確信他會盡力幫助你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Yes! I actually managed to give her some advice!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （是的！我實際上給了她一些建議！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (Should I go check if everything's all right?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我要不要去看看是否一切都好？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_42
TranslationLabels.Text: Unfortunately, I can’t make an exception for you, Annabelle.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不幸的是，我不能為你破例，安娜貝爾。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_43
TranslationLabels.Text: That wouldn’t be fair to the other students.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_47
TranslationLabels.Text: Listen, you show great potential, Annabelle!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 聽著，你展現了巨大的潛力，安娜貝爾！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_48
TranslationLabels.Text: But you can’t become a true artist unless you overcome your shyness.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但除非你克服害羞，否則你無法成為真正的藝術家。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_51
TranslationLabels.Text: Just ask someone you feel comfortable with.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只要問一個你覺得舒服的人就好了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder what they are talking about.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_54
TranslationLabels.Text: Anyway, I gotta run, I’m taking my wife to a very exclusive hotel for the weekend!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不管怎樣，我得跑了，我要帶我的妻子去一家非常高檔的酒店度週末！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_55
TranslationLabels.Text: My brother renovated the place, so he got me a juicy discount.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我哥哥裝修了這個地方，所以他給了我一個豐厚的折扣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_58
TranslationLabels.Text: (She walks up to you, looking defeated.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她向你走來，一臉挫敗的樣子。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_65
TranslationLabels.Text: (And you can't help but feel responsible.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你會情不自禁地覺得自己有責任。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_66
TranslationLabels.Text: (There has to be something I can do to make her feel better.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我必須做點什麼讓她感覺好一點。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_67
TranslationLabels.Text: So, was that your teacher you were just talking to?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，剛才跟你說話的就是你的老師嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_71
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, I’m sorry to hear that.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦，我很遺憾聽到這個消息。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_72
TranslationLabels.Text: (That’s probably the last time she’s going to follow my advice.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這可能是她最後一次聽從我的建議。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_74
TranslationLabels.Text: That he can’t make an exception for me.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_75
TranslationLabels.Text: *Softly* And that I should ask someone I’m…comfortable with.
TranslationLabels.Translation: *輕輕地*我應該問一個我…相處起來很舒服的人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_77
TranslationLabels.Text: (She startles, as if she only just realized she said that out loud.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她嚇了一跳，好像才意識到自己大聲說了這句話。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_78
TranslationLabels.Translation: 為了……呃……幫助……我的家庭作業。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_81
TranslationLabels.Text: (A crimson blush spreads across her face.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_83
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我的意思是…我不這麼認為…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (She pauses, as if considering how to respond.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她停頓了一下，似乎在考慮如何回應。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_87
TranslationLabels.Text: Uhm...we have to make a...nude painting.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯……我們必須畫一幅……裸體畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_88
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh! So that’s what this is all about?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_89
TranslationLabels.Text: I asked both Olly and Vicky to model for me, but they don’t want to do it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我請 Olly 和 Vicky 為我做模特，但他們不願意。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_90
TranslationLabels.Text: So now…I will fail the assignment.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以現在……我的作業會失敗。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_91
TranslationLabels.Text: (The words leave your mouth before you realize it.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （在你意識到之前，這些話就從你嘴裡說出了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_94
TranslationLabels.Text: (What the hell, she’s already seen me naked anyway.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （管他呢，反正她已經看到我裸體了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_96
TranslationLabels.Text: Unless you don’t want to, of course!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_97
TranslationLabels.Text: No! I-I mean, I do! Uhm, but...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不！我的意思是，我願意！嗯，但是…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_99
TranslationLabels.Text: Why? It’s just a painting, right?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 為什麼？這只是一幅畫，對吧？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_101
TranslationLabels.Text: Look, I know how important this is to you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 聽著，我知道這對你來說有多重要。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_102
TranslationLabels.Text: So if it will help you pass your assignment, I will gladly pose for you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 因此，如果它能幫助您通過作業，我很樂意為您擺姿勢。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_108
TranslationLabels.Text: Just let me know when you want me to pose for you, okay?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當你需要我為你擺姿勢時請告訴我，好嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_901_114
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I’m glad I’m able to help her out.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_902_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Are you ready to go to your art class?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你準備好去上藝術課了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_902_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm sure we will have plenty to talk about in a future update.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我確信我們在未來的更新中會有很多內容可以討論。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_902_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (All right, we're back at the mansion.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1000_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm going to be late for my art class.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1000_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (I hope nothing bad happened to him!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我希望他沒有發生什麼不好的事情！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_3_1000_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should check if [REL_M2] knows where he is...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我應該檢查一下[REL_M2]是否知道他在哪裡......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_h_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should spy on her when she's cleaning my room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該在她打掃我的房間時監視她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_r_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't quite know what to think of him.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不太知道該怎麼看待他。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can’t remember the last time I fell asleep without worrying about all the problems that needed fixing.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不記得上次我在不擔心所有需要解決的問題的情況下入睡是什麼時候了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (But now, those problems are a thing of the past!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但現在，這些問題都已成為過去！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (And to think it’s all thanks to my old man getting killed.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （想想這都是因為我的老人被殺了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can’t help but think there is some kind of poetic justice in that.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我忍不住認為這其中有某種詩意的正義。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (According to the schedule Rebecca sent me, I’m supposed to take Victoria to her kickboxing class at 19:00.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （根據Rebecca發給我的時間表，我應該在19:00帶Victoria去她的跆拳道課。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (At least we share a common interest, I guess.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想至少我們有共同的興趣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (I might be able to use that to break the ice a bit...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我也許可以用它來打破僵局......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (Either way, I'll need to make sure she gets there on time.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無論如何，我都需要確保她準時到達那裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't afford to fuck this up!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not when I finally got the chance to get out of this mess...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不是當我終於有機會擺脫困境時...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline also told me to stay out of their way, so I guess that means I have the rest of the day to myself.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳還告訴我不要妨礙他們，所以我想這意味著我可以自己度過這一天剩下的時間。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (I should have a look around the mansion. After all, I’ll be living here for a-)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我應該看看宅子周圍。畢竟我要在這裡住一段時間——）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (The door to your bedroom suddenly opens.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_21
TranslationLabels.Text: (A beautiful young woman wearing a maid outfit, is standing in the doorway.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （門口站著一位身穿女僕裝的美麗少婦。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_22
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m so sorry! I didn’t know someone was staying in this-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我很抱歉！我不知道有人住在這裡-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her eyes drift down towards your exposed torso.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的目光向下看向你裸露的軀幹。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (She seems to have lost her train of thought for a moment.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her eyes shoot back up and her cheeks turn red.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的眼睛猛地睜開，臉頰變紅。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_28
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! S-Sorry, I was just…I mean-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦！對不起，對不起，我只是……我的意思是——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_29
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m new here...I thought this was the guest room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我是新來的...我以為這是客房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_31
TranslationLabels.Text: It is, I just moved in yesterday.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，我昨天才剛搬進來。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_32
TranslationLabels.Text: My name is [NAME_1], by the way.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 順便說一句，我的名字是 [NAME_1]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_34
TranslationLabels.Text: Nice to meet you, [NAME_1]. I’m Kate.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 很高興認識你，[NAME_1]。我是凱特。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_35
TranslationLabels.Text: So, uhm...are you related to Miss Caine? Or are you here for business?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，呃……你和凱恩小姐有關係嗎？還是您來這裡是為了出差？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_36
TranslationLabels.Translation: 實際上兩者都是。她的丈夫是——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_39
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! I’m sorry for your loss!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦！我對你的損失感到抱歉！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_41
TranslationLabels.Text: Thanks. To be honest, I didn't really know him.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 謝謝。說實話，我不太了解他。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_43
TranslationLabels.Text: (There is an awkward silence for a moment.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Uhm...did you say you were here for business as well?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 呃……你是說你也是來出差的嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_46
TranslationLabels.Text: Just to keep them safe, until this whole thing blows over.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只是為了確保他們的安全，直到整個事情結束。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_47
TranslationLabels.Text: Really? Wow! So you’re a bodyguard?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 真的嗎？哇！所以你是保鑣？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_52
