TranslationLabels.Text: (Her cheeks flush crimson red again, and she forces herself to meet your gaze.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的臉頰再次漲得通紅，強迫自己與你的目光對視。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_54
TranslationLabels.Text: Anyway, I’ll…uhm…get out of your hair, so you can get dressed.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不管怎樣，我會……呃……離開你的頭髮，這樣你就可以穿衣服了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_55
TranslationLabels.Text: It was…very nice to meet you, [NAME_1].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_56
TranslationLabels.Text: I hope to see...more of you, later.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我希望以後能見到更多的人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_57
TranslationLabels.Text: (Heh. This one’s a bit of a flirt it seems.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （呵呵，這個好像有點調情的意思。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_58
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，我也很高興認識你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_1_62
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wouldn't mind getting to know her a bit better...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_101_3
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm a bit busy right now...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_101_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Do you mind if we talk later?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你介意我們稍後再談嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_102_3
TranslationLabels.Text: I was just getting Olivia's laundry...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我剛剛去給奧莉薇亞洗衣服…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_102_4
TranslationLabels.Text: But I've got my lunch break at 14:00, if you want to talk later?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我 14:00 午休，你想稍後再說嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_102_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, okay! I'll talk to you later then.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦好的！那我稍後再和你談談。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_108_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm? I think she left her door unlocked!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_108_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you turn the door handle, Kate comes out of Annabelle's bedroom.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你轉動門把手時，凱特從安娜貝爾的臥室裡出來。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_108_9
TranslationLabels.Text: I better get her room cleaned before she comes back.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我最好在她回來之前把她的房間打掃乾淨。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_108_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (She goes back inside and closes the door behind her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_110_2
TranslationLabels.Text: I hope I didn't make too much of a mess.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我希望我沒有把事情搞得太亂。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_110_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't worry, I've seen much worse.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 別擔心，我見過更糟糕的情況。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_110_5
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼這是什麼一回事呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_2
TranslationLabels.Text: So, care to tell me a bit more about yourself?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，願意告訴我更多關於你自己的資訊嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_6
TranslationLabels.Text: How did you get this job, for instance?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 例如，你是如何得到這份工作的？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, it started with a phone call from the police...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 事情的起因是從警察的一通電話開始的…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Wow! So you didn't even know about Miss Caine and the girls until recently?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哇！所以你直到最近才知道凱恩小姐和女孩們的事？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_11
TranslationLabels.Text: That must have been quite a shock.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這想必是相當令人震驚的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_13
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm still getting used to the whole situtation, if I'm honest.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 老實說，我還在適應整個情況。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_15
TranslationLabels.Text: Thanks for sharing that with me, [NAME_1].
TranslationLabels.Translation: 感謝您與我分享這一點，[NAME_1]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_17
TranslationLabels.Text: I only started working here the day before you arrived...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我在你來的前一天才開始在這裡工作...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_18
TranslationLabels.Text: So there's not much I could tell you about her.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以關於她我能告訴你的不多。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_19
TranslationLabels.Text: But she seems like a sweet girl.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但她看起來是個可愛的女孩。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_20
TranslationLabels.Text: And I like her positive energy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 而且我喜歡她的正能量。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_21
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't know her very well.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_22
TranslationLabels.Text: I think she's a bit shy.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_23
TranslationLabels.Text: I haven't seen her come out of her room a lot...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好久沒看到她從房間裡出來了…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_24
TranslationLabels.Text: She seems to be to very confident.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 看來她還是很有自信的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_25
TranslationLabels.Text: Perhaps a bit full of herself?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_26
TranslationLabels.Text: Although, I can't say that I blame her...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_27
TranslationLabels.Text: If I had her looks I would be too.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果我有她的長相，我也會的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_29
TranslationLabels.Text: You are easily as pretty as she is, if not more.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你很容易就和她一樣漂亮，甚至更漂亮。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_31
TranslationLabels.Text: If I didn't know any better...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果我不知道更好的話...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_32
TranslationLabels.Text: I'd say you are flirting with me!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我就說你在跟我調情吧！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_33
TranslationLabels.Text: I haven't really talked to her yet...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我還沒有真正和她說過話...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_34
TranslationLabels.Text: Didn't you have a job interview?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你沒有參加工作面試嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_35
TranslationLabels.Text: I did, but it was with Rebecca.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我做到了，但那是和麗貝卡一起。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess that makes sense, since Rebecca would be the one training her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想這是有道理的，因為麗貝卡將是訓練她的人。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_38
TranslationLabels.Text: I wouldn't know what to tell you...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不知道該告訴你什麼...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_40
TranslationLabels.Text: All I know is he owned some big tech company.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我只知道他擁有一家大型科技公司。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_41
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't you think she's a bit too...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_45
TranslationLabels.Text: She seems to take her job very seriously...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 看來她對自己的工作很認真啊…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_46
TranslationLabels.Text: A bit too seriously, if you ask me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你問我的話，有點太認真了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_47
TranslationLabels.Text: But don't tell her I said that!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_48
TranslationLabels.Text: And what exactly would you like to know about me?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_57
TranslationLabels.Text: I have a cat, named Furball.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_59
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm not in a relationship at the moment.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_107
TranslationLabels.Text: It's been fun talking to you, [NAME_1]...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_200_108
TranslationLabels.Text: But I really should get back to work.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我真的應該回去工作了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (All right, this should do the trick...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (You throw the toilet roll in and flush the toilet.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你把衛生紙丟進去然後沖馬桶。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (You go upstairs and knock on Annabelle’s bedroom door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你上樓敲安娜貝爾臥室的門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_10
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, there’s a bit of a…situation in the downstairs bathroom.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯，樓下的浴室有點……情況。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_14
TranslationLabels.Text: I’ll look at it as soon as I finish cleaning Annabelle’s room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 等我打掃完安娜貝爾的房間我就會看。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I think it’s rather... urgent, it was already overflowing a minute ago.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我覺得這事相當……緊急，一分鐘前就已經滿了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_17
TranslationLabels.Text: And I think Miss Caine wouldn’t want the water to spill into the entrance hall...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想凱恩小姐不會希望水濺到門廳...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (As soon as she is out of sight, you sneak into Annabelle’s bedroom.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她一消失，你就溜進安娜貝爾的臥室。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (You take a closer look at her screens.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Great! She still has the game running!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (She must have spent a crazy amount of time to be such a high level.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她一定花了瘋狂的時間才達到如此高的水平。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess that explains why she's always in here...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想這可以解釋為什麼她總是在這裡...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_33
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't know what that is, but it does say it's in the capital.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不知道那是什麼，但它確實說它在首都。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (I think I should be able to find her now.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我現在應該可以找到她了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's get out of here before Kate returns.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我們在凱特回來之前離開這裡吧。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just as you close the door behind you, Kate comes back up the stairs, looking flustered.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （正當你關上身後的門時，凱特又走上樓梯，看起來很慌張。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (Crap! Did she see me coming out of Annabelle’s room?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （糟糕！她看到我從安娜貝爾的房間出來了嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_40
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah…did you…manage the fix the problem?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_41
TranslationLabels.Text: I did. There was a whole toilet roll inside of it!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我做到了。裡面有一整捲衛生紙！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_43
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah, no idea how that happened…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，不知道這是怎麼發生的…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe one of the girls did it as a prank?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許其中一個女孩只是惡作劇？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_45
TranslationLabels.Text: You know, because you’re new here?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你知道嗎，因為你是新來的？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_46
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯……這不會讓我感到驚訝。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_47
TranslationLabels.Text: Anyway, thanks for letting me know.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不管怎樣，謝謝你讓我知道。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_48
TranslationLabels.Text: I better get back to cleaning Annabelle’s room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我最好回去打掃安娜貝爾的房間。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (I think I got away with it.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (I do feel bad for doing that to her...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_300_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (Sorry, Kate...your sacrifice will not be in vain!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （對不起，凱特……你的犧牲不會白費！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_2
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes, the day after I started working here.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，我開始在這裡工作的第二天。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (Why is she going through my bag?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah, he claims to be his son.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，他自稱是他的兒子。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (She is talking to someone on the phone.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah, a bit too much of a coincidence, if you ask me...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，如果你問我的話，這有點太巧合了…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_11
TranslationLabels.Text: But we have to be careful...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Having him around is going to complicate things.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 有他在身邊會讓事情變得複雜。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_16
TranslationLabels.Text: She puts away your bag and leaves the room...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她把你的包包收起來，離開了房間…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (Either way, it seems she is not who she pretends to be...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不管怎樣，看來她並不是她所假裝的那個人…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_21
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to find out why she's here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我需要找出她為什麼在這裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (Could this have anything to do with my father?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (Or maybe she's the one blackmailing me?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （或者也許她就是敲詐我的人？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_24
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯……我應該警告瑪德琳關於她的事嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to find out more first.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I'll make sure to keep a close eye on her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't let her know that I'm onto her though.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不過我不能讓她知道我喜歡她。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_7_301_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (This job is getting more complicated every day...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you sit down, the receptionist approaches you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你坐下時，接待員向你走來。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Welcome to Bishop and Fuller Technologies.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 歡迎來到 Bishop 和 Fuller Technologies。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Nice to meet you, Lisa. I'm [NAME_1].
TranslationLabels.Translation: 很高興認識你，麗莎。我是[NAME_1]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Would you like something to drink while you wait for Miss Caine?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在等待凱恩小姐的時候你想喝點什麼嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_8
TranslationLabels.Text: No, thank you. I'm good for now.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: All right. If there's anything you need, please feel free to let me know.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好的。如果您有什麼需要，請隨時告訴我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_10_1_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (She smiles and returns to her desk.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Madeline is a very strict woman. She is quite intimidating and very protective of her girls.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 瑪德琳是個非常嚴格的女人。她非常令人生畏，並且非常保護她的女兒們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her board meetings on Tuesday and Thursday at 14:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要帶她參加週二和週四 14:00 的董事會。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She likes to drink a glass of wine in the backyard in the evening.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她喜歡晚上在後院喝一杯酒。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_3
TranslationLabels.Text: She works out in the basement every morning.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她每天早上都在地下室運動。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Her room is unlocked when Rebecca prepares her evening bath.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當麗貝卡準備晚上洗澡時，她的房間沒有鎖。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I can sneak into her room when Rebecca is cleaning the bathroom.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我可以趁麗貝卡打掃浴室的時候偷偷溜進她的房間。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_6
TranslationLabels.Text: The book has to be in her room somewhere! I just need to look around very carefully.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這本書一定在她房間的某個地方！我只需要非常仔細地環顧四周。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_7
TranslationLabels.Text: I could spy on her when she takes her evening bath.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她晚上洗澡時我可以監視她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_8
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should join her by the pool in the evening for some wine.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該晚上和她一起去泳池邊喝點酒。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_10
TranslationLabels.Text: In the evening, she likes to read in her room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 晚上，她喜歡在房間裡看書。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_h_11
TranslationLabels.Text: Let's join her for another glass of wine.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們和她一起再喝一杯酒吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_r_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I'll just have to tolerate his presence until this whole thing blows over.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我只能忍受他的存在，直到整件事平息為止。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_r_2
TranslationLabels.Text: He doesn't seem to be much like his father...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他看起來不太像他的父親…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (You notice her form is a bit off.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你注意到她的姿勢有點不對勁。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (She might end up injuring herself if she keeps doing that.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果她繼續這樣做，她最終可能會受傷。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can offer her some guidance.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (She's wearing a very tight top that accentuates her ample breasts.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她穿著一件非常緊身的上衣，凸顯了她豐滿的胸部。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_8
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm in the middle of my workout.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_10
TranslationLabels.Text: I noticed some minor flaws in your form, and was wondering if I could offer you some advice?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我注意到您的表格中存在一些小缺陷，想知道我是否可以為您提供一些建議？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (She gets an agitated look on her face.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_12
TranslationLabels.Text: *Scoffs* Oh? So now you're a personal trainer as well?
TranslationLabels.Translation: *嘲笑*哦？那麼現在您也是私人教練呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_13
TranslationLabels.Text: No, but I do have a lot of experience-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不，但我確實有很多經驗-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_14
TranslationLabels.Text: I can handle myself just fine.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_15
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，如果你不介意的話？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Well? Go on then. Show me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 出色地？再接再厲。給我看看。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Let's start by assuming the initial pose...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 讓我們從假設初始姿勢開始...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (You support her as she moves back into her previous position.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她回到原來的位置時，你支持她。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_26
TranslationLabels.Text: Now lift your pelvis up a bit more, so that your body forms a straight line from head to heels.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在將骨盆再抬起一點，使身體從頭到腳跟形成一條直線。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (You gently push her body upwards, guiding her into the correct position.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你輕輕地將她的身體向上推，引導她進入正確的位置。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (You move your right hand to her stomach.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_34
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，保持你的核心參與。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (Fuck! Am I really going to do this?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (If I do, I'll probably get fired...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果我這樣做的話，我可能會被解僱......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, if I don't do it, I might get fired as well...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話又說回來，如果我不這樣做，我也可能會被解僱......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I don’t have much of a choice…)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (And move your hand to her ass.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_42
TranslationLabels.Text: (You try to sound as casual as you can...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你盡量讓自己聽起來很隨意…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_43
TranslationLabels.Text: Make sure to tighten your butt as you hold this position.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 保持這個姿勢時，確保收緊臀部。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_44
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her muscles tense, but you're not sure if it's out of shock or if she's just following your instructions.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的肌肉緊張，但你不確定這是出於震驚還是只是按照你的指示行事。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_46
TranslationLabels.Text: (She suddenly turns her head towards you.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_53
TranslationLabels.Text: (That was not the reaction I was expecting...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_58
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should...rely...on your help more often...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該…多…依賴…你的幫助…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_60
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not even a comment about me touching her ass?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （甚至沒有評論我摸她的屁股？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_62
TranslationLabels.Text: Feel free to ask me whenever you need help.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 每當您需要幫助時，請隨時詢問我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_66
TranslationLabels.Text: I should get ready for work.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該準備好去上班了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_68
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she leaves the basement, you breathe a sigh of relief.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她離開地下室時，你鬆了一口氣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_69
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't know how... but I feel like I just dodged a huge bullet... somehow.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不知道怎麼...但我感覺我剛剛躲過了一顆巨大的子彈...不知何故。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_70
TranslationLabels.Text: (She didn't react to me touching her...at all.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她對我觸摸她沒有任何反應......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_71
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe Madeline isn't as uptight as I thought?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許瑪德琳並不像我想像的那麼緊張？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_75
TranslationLabels.Text: (But how would the blackmailer even know that?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但是勒索者怎麼會知道這一點呢？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_76
TranslationLabels.Translation: （除非……瑪德琳本人就是勒索者！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_80
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's like my list of potential suspects is only getting longer...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （就好像我的潛在嫌疑犯名單只會越來越長...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_81
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I guess in this particular case...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_83
TranslationLabels.Text: (She made it very clear that she doesn't want my help.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她明確表示她不需要我的幫助。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_84
TranslationLabels.Text: (So I better not distract her again.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以我最好不要再分散她的注意力。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_85
TranslationLabels.Text: (At least not until I earn her trust a bit more...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （至少在我贏得她更多的信任之前…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (There's nothing more I can do here in the current version.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_100_87
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I'm sure that will change soon...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我相信這種情況很快就會改變......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_101_1
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳正在和奧莉維亞一起吃早餐。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_101_5
TranslationLabels.Text: There’s fresh coffee in the pot as well.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_101_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (I should probably let her finish her breakfast in peace.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我也許應該讓她安靜地吃完早餐。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you enter Madeline’s office, she seems agitated.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你進入瑪德琳的辦公室時，她似乎很興奮。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Not particularly. I just wanted to-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_5
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you haven't noticed, [NAME_1]...I am extremely busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果您沒有註意到，[NAME_1]...我非常忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_6
TranslationLabels.Text: So unless something important comes up, please refrain from disturbing me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以除非有什麼重要的事情發生，否則請不要打擾我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, Miss Caine. My apologies.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，凱恩小姐。我很抱歉。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (You leave the office and close the door behind you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你離開辦公室關上身後的門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_102_10
TranslationLabels.Text: What the hell is wrong with you?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline is having a glass of wine.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can offer to refill her glass?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (It might help break the ice a bit.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks at her glass, seemingly surprised to find it almost empty.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她看著杯子，似乎驚訝地發現它幾乎空了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (She pauses as she considers your offer.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她在考慮你的提議時停了下來。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_18
TranslationLabels.Text: Enjoy your wine and have a good night.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 享受您的美酒，度過一個美好的夜晚。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_103
TranslationLabels.Text: Would you like some more wine?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_104
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks at her almost empty glass.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_112
TranslationLabels.Text: Enjoy your wine and have a good night.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 享受您的美酒，度過一個美好的夜晚。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_115
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm...is she warming up to me, or is it just my imagination?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯……她是在向我示好，還是只是我的想像？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_204
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks at her almost empty glass.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_210
TranslationLabels.Text: (Wait...did she just invite me to join her for a glass of wine?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （等等……她剛剛邀請我和她一起喝一杯酒嗎？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_212
TranslationLabels.Text: (It wasn't so much an invitation as an order.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這與其說是邀請，不如說是命令。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_214
TranslationLabels.Text: (Besides, I wouldn't mind a glass of some, probably expensive, red wine.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （此外，我不介意喝一杯可能很貴的紅酒。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_217
TranslationLabels.Text: (She just stares at you, without saying a word...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_218
TranslationLabels.Text: (And then takes a sip of her wine.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_219
TranslationLabels.Text: (Feeling a bit uncomfortable, you imitate her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （感覺有點不舒服，你就模仿她。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_221
TranslationLabels.Text: (You've had some good wine before, but never anything like this.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你以前喝過一些好酒，但從來沒有喝過這樣的酒。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_224
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh...she wants to know what I think?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_225
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你努力讓自己聽起來很老練。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_226
TranslationLabels.Text: It's very smooth, with just the right amount of fruity sweetness.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 它非常順滑，帶有恰到好處的果香甜味。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_227
TranslationLabels.Text: And I like how it's balanced by a subtle hint of oakiness.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我喜歡它與淡淡的橡木味的平衡。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_230
TranslationLabels.Text: I didn't know you were a wine aficionado?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不知道你是個葡萄酒愛好者？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_231
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, I don't know about that...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_233
TranslationLabels.Translation: 尤其是這麼精緻的一件。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_235
TranslationLabels.Text: I will keep that in mind.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_103_303
TranslationLabels.Text: Will you join me for a glass of wine?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你願意和我一起喝杯酒嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (She is reading on her bed, wearing a very sexy nightgown.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她正在床上看書，穿著一件非常性感的睡衣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_3
TranslationLabels.Text: What the hell do you think you’re doing in my room?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你到底想在我房間裡做什麼？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, Miss Caine. My apologies.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，凱恩小姐。我很抱歉。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (She is reading on her bed, wearing a very sexy nightgown.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她正在床上看書，穿著一件非常性感的睡衣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (Your eyes are immediately drawn to her breasts.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你的目光立刻被她的胸部吸引。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_16
TranslationLabels.Text: What do you think you're doing in MY bedroom?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你認為你在我的臥室裡做什麼？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_104_18
TranslationLabels.Text: Actually...I just wanted to say good night.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_2
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m still getting used to the idea of you being John’s son.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我還在習慣你是約翰的兒子這個想法。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_3
TranslationLabels.Text: I see the resemblance, of course…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，我看到了相似之處…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_4
TranslationLabels.Text: But you are nothing like him.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her voice softens, a hint of vulnerability creeping in.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的聲音變得柔和，透露出一絲脆弱。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_7
TranslationLabels.Text: He was selfish, arrogant and he had a bad temper.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_9
TranslationLabels.Text: So far, you seem…quite the opposite of that.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 到目前為止，你似乎……恰恰相反。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Did she just give me a compliment?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_13
TranslationLabels.Text: She has a positive attitude and is a good student.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她態度積極，是個好學生。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_15
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她停頓了一下，好像發現了自己。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (Was she about to say something else?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh, I know all about what you're doing downstairs...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_19
TranslationLabels.Text: She understands it’s for her own good.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Annabelle is both incredibly intelligent and talented.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 安娜貝爾既聰明又有才華。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Unfortunately, she also has a tendency to be a bit…lazy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不幸的是，她也有一點……懶惰的傾向。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_23
TranslationLabels.Text: If only she would apply herself a bit more.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果她能多努力一點就好了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Instead, she stays in her room all day, playing video games and reading comic books.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 相反，她整天待在房間裡，玩電子遊戲和閱讀漫畫書。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_25
TranslationLabels.Text: I have tried so many ways to motivate that girl.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我嘗試了很多方法來激勵那個女孩。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_26
TranslationLabels.Text: But I just can’t seem to get through to her.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not even by spanking her in your secret discipline room, you mean?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你的意思是，甚至在你的秘密紀律室裡打她屁股也不行？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_33
TranslationLabels.Translation: 維多利亞是……相當少數的人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_34
TranslationLabels.Text: Always expecting everyone to do as she tells them.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 總是期望每個人都照她所說的去做。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_35
TranslationLabels.Text: Yet absolutely hates being told what to do herself.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但她絕對討厭別人告訴她自己該做什麼。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder who she got that from?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想知道她從誰那裡得到的？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_37
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m sure she’ll make a great leader someday…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我確信有一天她會成為一個偉大的領導者...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_38
TranslationLabels.Text: But as long as she’s living under my roof, she needs to understand that I am the one in charge.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但只要她住在我的屋簷下，她就需要明白我才是負責人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_39
TranslationLabels.Text: I try to be patient with her, but sometimes she really tests my limits.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我試著對她有耐心，但有時她真的會考驗我的極限。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_40
TranslationLabels.Text: That girl is just too stubborn for her own good.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這丫頭實在是太固執了，不顧自己的利益。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_41
TranslationLabels.Text: I made her help the maids do some chores once.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 有一次我請她幫女傭做一些家事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_42
TranslationLabels.Text: Just to teach her some discipline…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只是為了教她一些紀律......

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her eyes stare into the distance and her voice trails off.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的眼睛凝視著遠方，聲音逐漸減弱。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_48
TranslationLabels.Text: It didn’t even seem to faze her…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這似乎並沒有讓她感到困擾…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_52
TranslationLabels.Text: I...took away her phone for an entire month.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我……拿走了她的手機整整一個月。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_53
TranslationLabels.Text: You know how these young girls are when it comes to their social media.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你知道這些年輕女孩在社群媒體上的表現如何。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_55
TranslationLabels.Text: (Something tells me that was not how she punished Victoria...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有件事告訴我，這不是她懲罰維多利亞的方式...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_60
TranslationLabels.Text: It’s quite a lot to deal with, isn't it?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 有很多事情需要處理，不是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_62
TranslationLabels.Text: It is true that things have been a bit…stressful lately.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_63
TranslationLabels.Text: There are a lot of arrangements that need to be made before selling the company.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在出售公司之前，需要先做很多安排。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_64
TranslationLabels.Text: And John wasn’t particularly good at keeping a structured administration.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 約翰也不太擅長維持結構化的管理。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_65
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, the board told me they could handle it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，董事會告訴我他們可以處理。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_69
TranslationLabels.Text: But as soon as B&F Technologies is sold, things should return to normal.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但一旦 B&F Technologies 出售，一切就會恢復正常。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_70
TranslationLabels.Text: And we will be able to put this whole thing behind us.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們將能夠把這整件事拋在腦後。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_71
TranslationLabels.Text: I'd rather not talk about him right now.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_74
TranslationLabels.Text: She has been with us a long time.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她和我們在一起已經很久了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_75
TranslationLabels.Text: And she is the only one who worked for us that never took any crap from John.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她是唯一一個為我們工作的人，從來沒有聽過約翰的任何廢話。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_77
TranslationLabels.Text: Yeah, she doesn’t seem like a person to take crap from…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是啊，她看起來不像是個能接受廢話的人…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_80
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，她是個堅強的女人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_81
TranslationLabels.Text: *Sofly* But she has a gentle side to her as well...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_82
TranslationLabels.Text: Really, what makes you say that?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_84
TranslationLabels.Translation: 無論如何，關於麗貝卡的事就夠了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_86
TranslationLabels.Text: When Joanne resigned, the agency sent her as a replacement.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 喬安妮辭職後，該機構派她作為替代者。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_89
TranslationLabels.Text: She was with us almost as long as Rebecca.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她和我們在一起的時間幾乎和麗貝卡一樣長。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_90
TranslationLabels.Text: But when John died, she resigned the very next day.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但約翰去世後，她第二天就辭職了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_92
TranslationLabels.Text: She said she couldn’t deal with the stress anymore.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她說她無法再承受壓力了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_95
TranslationLabels.Text: Never trusted her in the first place.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 從一開始就沒有信任過她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_96
TranslationLabels.Text: It was John who hired her.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_97
TranslationLabels.Translation: *嘲笑*顯然是因為她「豐富的經驗」...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_99
TranslationLabels.Text: (If you ask me, this Joanne seems rather suspicious…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果你問我的話，這個喬安看起來很可疑…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_100
TranslationLabels.Text: (Could she have been involved with my father’s death somehow?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她是否與我父親的死有某種關係？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_101
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, it's getting a bit late, [NAME_1].

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_102
TranslationLabels.Text: (She finishes her wine with one final sip.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_103
TranslationLabels.Text: I should get ready for bed.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_104
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe it's because of the wine, or maybe you're just tired...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （可能是因為酒的緣故，也可能只是累了……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_105
TranslationLabels.Text: (But for a split second, you zone out and let your eyes drift down.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但有那麼一瞬間，你走神了，目光向下飄移。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_108
TranslationLabels.Text: (You quickly look up and meet her eyes.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你迅速抬起頭，與她的目光相遇。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_109
TranslationLabels.Text: (She raises an eyebrow, but doesn't say anything.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她揚起一邊眉毛，但什麼也沒說。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_200_117
TranslationLabels.Text: Thank you for the wine, Miss Caine.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh! Madeline is taking her evening bath...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm...she appears to be lost in thought.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (She reaches for a glass of wine on the edge of the bathtub...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她伸手去拿浴缸邊的一杯酒…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (Wow! She just finished the entire glass in one sip...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline leans back with a sigh and closes her eyes...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳嘆了一口氣，向後靠去，閉上了眼睛…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (And you can't help but admire her impressive bosom.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你會情不自禁地欣賞她令人印象深刻的胸部。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (She really has a great pair of tits!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (You have unlocked Madeline's naked paperdoll animation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （您已經解鎖了瑪德琳的裸體紙娃娃動畫。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (I think it's time for me to get out of here.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_400_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (You leave the corridor and return to the utility closet.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hello, Miss Caine. Are you ready to go to your board meeting?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你好，凱恩小姐。您準備好參加董事會會議了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Get the car ready. I'll be there in a few minutes.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 準備好車。我幾分鐘後就到。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Coming up next, a compelling twist in the murder case everyone is talking about.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 接下來，每個人都在談論的謀殺案發生了引人注目的轉折。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (You lean in to change the station.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Could Aron Fuller, co-founder of B&F Technologies, be linked to the murder of his business partner and tech mogul, John Bishop?
TranslationLabels.Translation: B&F Technologies 聯合創始人 Aron Fuller 是否與其商業夥伴兼科技大亨約翰畢肖普 (John Bishop) 的謀殺案有關？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_13
TranslationLabels.Text: An anonymous source revealed a recent buyout offer turned long-time friends into bitter enemies, when Fuller was eager to accept, but Bishop refused.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一位匿名消息人士透露，最近的一項收購要約將老朋友變成了死敵，富勒急於接受，但畢肖普拒絕了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_14
TranslationLabels.Text: Was there really a buyout offer? And did Bishop, by refusing to sign the deal, unwittingly sign his own death warrant instead?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 真的有買斷要約嗎？畢夏普是否因拒絕簽署協議而無意中簽署了自己的死刑令？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_15
TranslationLabels.Text: We reached out to B&F Technologies for a statement, but they declined to comment pending the ongoing investigation.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們聯繫了 B&F Technologies 尋求一份聲明，但他們在調查正在進行期間拒絕發表評論。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_16
TranslationLabels.Text: Tune in to MNS news for more updates on this murder mystery.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 請收聽 MNS 新聞，以了解有關這起謀殺之謎的更多最新消息。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_17
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, over to you, Patricia, for the weather.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，帕特里夏，天氣狀況交給你了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_19
TranslationLabels.Text: Do you think there is any truth to these allegations?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您認為這些指控是否屬實？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_21
TranslationLabels.Text: The other board members, however…I’m not so sure.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 然而，其他董事會成員……我不太確定。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Wait…the same board members you’re meeting in a few minutes?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 等等……幾分鐘後您將要見到的董事會成員？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_23
TranslationLabels.Text: If you genuinely suspect one of them could be the killer, you should consider cancelling the meeting.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果您確實懷疑其中一人可能是兇手，您應該考慮取消會議。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Or at the very least, allow me to-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_25
TranslationLabels.Text: And what are they going to do in a room full of people?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他們要在一個擠滿人的房間裡做什麼？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_26
TranslationLabels.Text: Besides, the list of potential killers is endless.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 此外，潛在殺手的名單是無窮無盡的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_27
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你的……父親……所到之處都樹敵。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (She utters the word "father" as if it leaves a bitter taste in her mouth.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她說出「父親」這個詞，彷彿嘴裡留下了苦澀的味道。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_29
TranslationLabels.Text: That was the kind of man he was.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder why she married him in the first place...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (There’s no hint of affection or grief in her voice at all.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的聲音中根本沒有任何感情或悲傷的跡象。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_33
TranslationLabels.Text: And if his refusal to sell the company truly was the reason he was killed, that won’t be an issue any longer.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果他拒絕出售公司確實是他被殺的原因，那麼這將不再是問題。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_37
TranslationLabels.Text: We’re here. Drive up to the main building.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_38
TranslationLabels.Text: There is a parking space reserved in my name.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 有一個以我的名義預留的停車位。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm…did she agree to sell the company?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_41
TranslationLabels.Text: (And if so…wouldn’t that make her a suspect as well?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果是這樣……那不是也會讓她成為嫌疑犯嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_43
TranslationLabels.Text: The meeting is on the top floor of the main building.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_44
TranslationLabels.Text: You can wait for me in the lobby.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_46
TranslationLabels.Text: I should be back in about two hours.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 大約兩個小時後我應該會回來。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_47
TranslationLabels.Text: If you need anything, just ask the receptionist.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果您需要任何東西，請詢問接待員。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_49
TranslationLabels.Text: (All right. I guess I'll just make myself comfortable.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好。我想我會讓自己舒服一點。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_100
TranslationLabels.Text: That he was only after our money.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_101
TranslationLabels.Text: But I was too blind to see it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我太盲目了，看不到它。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_103
TranslationLabels.Text: And even got him to fund John's startup.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 甚至讓他資助約翰的新創公司。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_104
TranslationLabels.Text: But soon after, I realized my father was right all along.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但不久之後，我意識到父親一直都是對的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_105
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, I was too proud to admit it...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，我太驕傲了，不敢承認…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_106
TranslationLabels.Text: As for John…I’m sure he would have left me long ago if I didn’t own half of his stock.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 至於約翰……我敢肯定，如果我沒有擁有他一半的股票，他早就離開我了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_107
TranslationLabels.Text: So, we kept up the facade…for all those years.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以，這些年來我們一直保持著外觀。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_108
TranslationLabels.Text: And we just lived our separate lives.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 而我們只是過著各自的生活。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_109
TranslationLabels.Text: Me, taking care of the girls...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_111
TranslationLabels.Text: Him, constantly going on his “business trips”.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_112
TranslationLabels.Text: Which to him, were just another excuse to bed any woman he could get into his hotel room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 對他來說，這只是另一個藉口，可以和他能進入飯店房間的任何女人上床。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_114
TranslationLabels.Text: He couldn’t care less about me or the girls.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他一點也不關心我或女孩們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_115
TranslationLabels.Text: He didn’t even show up for their birthdays.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他甚至沒有出現在他們的生日那天。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_117
TranslationLabels.Text: All he ever cared about was himself…and his damned company.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他所關心的只是他自己……還有他該死的公司。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_118
TranslationLabels.Text: So, no. I am not upset that he is dead.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以不行。他死了我並不難過。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_120
TranslationLabels.Text: In fact, I’m glad to finally be rid of him.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 事實上，我很高興終於擺脫他了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_121
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't say that I blame her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_122
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, if you will excuse me, I have matters to attend to.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，請原諒，我有事情要處理。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_123
TranslationLabels.Text: (She closes her laptop and reaches for the door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她合上筆記型電腦，伸手去開門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_125
TranslationLabels.Text: (She meets your eyes in the rear-view mirror.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她在後視鏡中與你的目光相遇。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_131
TranslationLabels.Text: (And with that she leaves the car and goes inside the mansion.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_133
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm starting to understand why she acts the way she does.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我開始理解她為什麼要這樣做。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_135
TranslationLabels.Text: (Perhaps with my old man gone, she can finally pick up the pieces and move on with her life.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許隨著我老人的過世，她終於可以收拾殘局，繼續她的生活了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_900_136
TranslationLabels.Text: (You head inside, pondering this side of Madeline you hadn't seen before.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你走進去，思考著瑪德琳你從未見過的這一面。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_901_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hello, Miss Caine. Are you ready to go to your board meeting?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你好，凱恩小姐。您準備好參加董事會會議了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_901_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Get the car ready. I'll be there in a few minutes.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 準備好車。我幾分鐘後就到。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_901_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (This might be a good opportunity to get to know her a bit better.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這可能是個更好地了解她的好機會。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_901_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm sure there will be some interesting dialog options here in a future update.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我確信在未來的更新中將會有一些有趣的對話框選項。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_5_901_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (All right, we're back at the mansion.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_1
TranslationLabels.Text: You've been around. Having many years of experience working as a bodyguard, nothing gets by you or surprises you anymore. At least that's what you think...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你一直在身邊。擁有多年的保鑣工作經驗，不會再有什麼事情讓你感到驚訝或驚訝。至少你是這麼認為的...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should just go to my room and relax a little.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該回自己的房間放鬆一下。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_2
TranslationLabels.Text: The blackmailer said I should expose myself to Olivia.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 勒索者說我應該向奧莉維亞暴露自己。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_3
TranslationLabels.Text: I have a feeling I should focus on Olivia for now.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我有一種感覺，現在我應該把注意力集中在奧莉維亞身上。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_4
TranslationLabels.Text: I think I should go to my room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想我應該回我的房間去。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_5
TranslationLabels.Text: This time, the blackmailer wants me to expose myself to Annabelle.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這一次，勒索者想讓我向安娜貝爾暴露自己。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_6
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm sure the blackmailer will contact me again eventually.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我確信勒索者最終會再次聯繫我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_7
TranslationLabels.Text: The blackmailer wants me to grab Madeline's ass.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 勒索者要我抓住瑪德琳的屁股。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_8
TranslationLabels.Text: I should probably explore the mansion a bit more.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我或許應該多探索這棟宅邸。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_8
TranslationLabels.Text: I should spend some more time at the mansion.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該在宅子裡多待一些時間。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_9
TranslationLabels.Text: I wonder if there's anything useful in my bedroom.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想知道我的臥室裡有沒有什麼有用的東西。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_11
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to look around the mansion and find out where I can use that key.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要環顧這棟宅邸，找出在哪裡可以使用那把鑰匙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_12
TranslationLabels.Text: I should investigate the utility closet.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該調查一下雜物間。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_13
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to figure out the passcode that unlocks the metal door in the utility room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要找出打開雜物間金屬門的密碼。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_14
TranslationLabels.Text: I'll go back to utility closet after Rebecca has gone home for the day.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 麗貝卡回家後我會回到雜物間。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_15
TranslationLabels.Text: I should return the book of Greed to the study.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該把《貪婪》這本書放回書房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I should return the book of Sloth to the study.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該把《懶惰之書》放回書房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_17
TranslationLabels.Text: I should return the book of Envy to the study.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該把《嫉妒》這本書放回書房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_18
TranslationLabels.Text: I should return the book of Pride to the study.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該把驕傲之書放回書房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_19
TranslationLabels.Text: I should return the book of Lust to the study.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該把慾望之書放回書房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_h_20
TranslationLabels.Text: I should have dinner with the girls.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該和女孩們一起吃晚餐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_a_2
TranslationLabels.Text: Return all books of Sin to the bookcase.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 將所有罪惡之書放回書櫃。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_a_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Figure out the passcode for the metal door.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_a_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Spy on each of the girls while they are in the bathroom.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當每個女孩在浴室時監視她們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_a_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Inspect each of the themed paintings in the mansion.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 檢查宅邸中的每幅主題畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't see the point of that.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不明白這有什麼意義。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_5_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I better get back to the mansion.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_7_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Ahh! Nothing like a comfortable bed after a long day.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （啊！漫長的一天之後，沒有什麼比一張舒適的床更好的了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_7_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder what today has in store for me...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想知道今天我為我準備了什麼...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_7_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, only one way to find out!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好吧，只有一種方法可以找出答案！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_8_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to finish my plan first...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_5
TranslationLabels.Text:
Play the introduction story?
(Note: Recommended for new players.)
TranslationLabels.Translation:
玩介紹故事嗎？
（註：推薦給新玩家。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_5_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Yes, I want to know what the story is about.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （是的，我想知道這個故事是關於什麼的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_5_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (No, I already know the background story.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_7
TranslationLabels.Translation: “威脅評估、安全諮詢、個人防護。”

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_16
TranslationLabels.Text: Wow! Now that's something you don't hear very often.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哇！現在，這是你不常聽到的事情。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_17
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那一定是太令人興奮了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_18
TranslationLabels.Text: I bet you have some great stories to-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我敢打賭你一定有一些很棒的故事-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_23
TranslationLabels.Text: So are you absolutely sure there's no one you can think of who would have wanted to hurt your father?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那你絕對確定你能想到沒有人想要傷害你的父親嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_25
TranslationLabels.Text: Like I said, I haven't seen him or talked to him since I was a little kid.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 就像我說的，我從小就沒有見過他，也沒有跟他說過話。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_26
TranslationLabels.Text: I can't even tell you what he looked like, let alone if anyone was after him.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我甚至無法告訴你他長什麼樣子，更不用說是否有人在追捕他了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_28
TranslationLabels.Text: That must have been hard for you and your mother...being abandoned by him like that.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這對你和你的母親來說一定很難受……被他這樣拋棄了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_29
TranslationLabels.Text: And at such a young age too.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_30
TranslationLabels.Text: You must have been very angry with him.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_32
TranslationLabels.Text: Hated his guts for it. Still do.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 恨他的膽量。仍然這樣做。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_33
TranslationLabels.Text: But not enough to kill him if that's what you are implying.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但如果你是這麼想的話，還不足以殺死他。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_34
TranslationLabels.Text: N-No! Of course not. I wasn't implying that at all!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不、不！當然不是。我根本沒有這個意思！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_35
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, you are not a suspect!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_36
TranslationLabels.Text: In that case...it's getting late, and I have more important things to do.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼……時間不早了，我還有更重要的事情要做。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_37
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，如果你不介意的話？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_39
TranslationLabels.Text: Thank you for coming in, Mr. Bishop.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 謝謝您的光臨，畢肖普先生。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_40
TranslationLabels.Text: Please give me a call if anything else comes to mind.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果還有什麼想法，請打電話給我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_43
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you leave his office, you notice an attractive woman waiting outside.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你離開他的辦公室時，你注意到一個漂亮的女人在外面等候。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_46
TranslationLabels.Text: (I would love to try to put a smile on those pretty lips.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我很想嘗試在那些美麗的嘴唇上微笑。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (Unfortunately, I've got other things to worry about right now...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不幸的是，我現在還有其他事情要擔心......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (As if I didn't have enough on my mind already.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (You look at the eviction letter again.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_53
TranslationLabels.Text: (So, they are finally kicking me out of this place?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以，他們終於把我趕出了這個地方？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess it was going to happen sooner or later.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (I just can't seem to catch a break.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_63
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems I can't even get shit-faced in peace.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （看來我連臭臉都無法平靜了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_66
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get up and walk towards the door.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_67
TranslationLabels.Text: (But as soon as you open it, a giant of a man forces his way in and points a gun at you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但你一打開門，一個巨人就闖了進來，用槍指著你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_71
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you step back, he enters your apartment.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你退後一步時，他進入了你的公寓。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_74
TranslationLabels.Text: Look, I already told him...I just need a little more time.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 聽著，我已經告訴他了……我只是需要多一點時間。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_75
TranslationLabels.Text: Time's up. Either you pay right now...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 時間到。要嘛你現在付錢...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_76
TranslationLabels.Text: (He menacingly points his gun at you.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_77
TranslationLabels.Text: Or I put a hole in you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 或者我在你身上挖了一個洞。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_78
TranslationLabels.Text: (Little does he know that this is hardly the first time someone has pointed a gun at you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （他幾乎不知道這不是第一次有人用槍指著你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_79
TranslationLabels.Text: (The countless hours of training make your body react almost instinctively.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無數小時的訓練讓你的身體幾乎本能地做出反應。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_80
TranslationLabels.Text: (In one fluid motion, you move your head out of the line of fire, firmly grab the gun with your left hand...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （以一種流暢的動作，你將頭移出火線，用左手牢牢抓住槍......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (And smash the side of your right hand into his wrist to disarm him.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （然後用你的右手側擊打他的手腕以解除他的武裝。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_90
TranslationLabels.Text: I wasn't going to shoot you...I swear!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不會開槍打你的…我發誓！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_91
TranslationLabels.Text: Tell Ruslan he will get his money.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 告訴魯斯蘭他會得到他的錢。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_92
TranslationLabels.Text: He will just have to be patient a bit longer.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_93
TranslationLabels.Text: Ruslan is not known for his patience.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 魯斯蘭並不以耐心而聞名。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_94
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't give a shit. Now get the fuck out of my apartment!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不在乎。現在他媽的滾出我的公寓！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_96
TranslationLabels.Text: Next time he will just send more-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_102
TranslationLabels.Text: (As if I didn't have enough on my mind already.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_103
TranslationLabels.Text: (You drop down onto your couch with a throbbing headache.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_104
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seemed like a good idea at the time...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_106
TranslationLabels.Text: (A friend hooked you up with Ruslan, a local "investor".)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （一位朋友為你介紹了當地的「投資者」魯斯蘭。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_107
TranslationLabels.Text: (I never should have taken his money...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_108
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I was so sure my business would be a success.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_112
TranslationLabels.Text: (Soon, you had to fire your staff and sell off all your equipment.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （很快，您不得不解僱員工並賣掉所有設備。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_116
TranslationLabels.Text: (And you can't help but ask yourself...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_117
TranslationLabels.Text: (How am I ever going to get myself out of this mess?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我怎樣才能讓自己擺脫困境？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_118
TranslationLabels.Text: (You notice that you are still holding the gun in your hand.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你注意到你手上仍然握著槍。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_122
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, it's not like all my problems are going to just magically-)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話又說回來，我的所有問題並不是都會神奇地解決——）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_134
TranslationLabels.Text: (This might be just the break I was waiting for!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這可能正是我等待的休息時間！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_135
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe there is still a chance to fix this mess I'm in after all.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我還是有機會解決現在的困境。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_137
TranslationLabels.Text: (You arrive at the address you were given, and find yourself in front of a big gate.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你到達了給你的地址，發現自己站在一扇大門前。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_141
TranslationLabels.Text: (Before you can finish your thought, the gates swing open.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （在你完成你的想法之前，大門打開了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_143
TranslationLabels.Text: (You pull up their driveway and notice a police car with two cops inside parked out front.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你把車停在他們的車道上，發現一輛警車停在前面，裡面有兩名警察。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_145
TranslationLabels.Text: (Looks like this place is under surveillance...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_146
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get out and walk up to the front door.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_147
TranslationLabels.Text: (But before you can ring the bell, a beautiful woman wearing a maid uniform opens the door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但還沒等你按門鈴，一位穿著女僕裝的美女就打開了門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_149
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes, that's right. Nice to meet-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 恩，那就對了。很高興認識-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_152
TranslationLabels.Text: (You follow her into what looks like a study, where she asks you to take a seat.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你跟著她進入一個看起來像書房的地方，她請你坐下。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_153
TranslationLabels.Text: Miss Caine will be with you shortly.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 凱恩小姐很快就會來找你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_156
TranslationLabels.Text: (She leaves before you can finish your sentence.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_157
TranslationLabels.Text: (Someone got up on the wrong side of bed this morning.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （今天早上有人起床的方向不對。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_159
TranslationLabels.Text: (Miss Caine sure is taking her time...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_161
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder what line of work she's in, this mansion is huge.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不知道她是做什麼工作的，這棟豪宅很大。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_165
TranslationLabels.Text: (Wait, isn't that the woman I saw at the police station yesterday?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （等等，這不是我昨天在警察局看到的那個女人嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_167
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get up from your seat to introduce yourself.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你從座位上站起來，自我介紹。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_168
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes. It's nice to meet you, Miss-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的。很高興認識你，小姐——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_169
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你願意跟隨我的話。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_170
TranslationLabels.Text: (She makes it sound more like a command than a question.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她讓它聽起來更像是命令而不是問題。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_172
TranslationLabels.Text: (You follow her inside her office where you both sit down at her desk.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你跟著她走進她的辦公室，你們兩個坐在她的辦公桌前。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_173
TranslationLabels.Text: My name is Madeline Caine. Thank you for coming, Mister Bishop.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我叫瑪德琳‧凱恩。謝謝您的光臨，主教先生。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_174
TranslationLabels.Text: It's my pleasure, Miss Caine. But please, call me [NAME_1].
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這是我的榮幸，凱恩小姐。但請叫我 [NAME_1]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_176
TranslationLabels.Text: (You notice she doesn't extend you the same courtesy.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你注意到她沒有給你同樣的禮貌。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_177
TranslationLabels.Text: I'll get straight to the point. My husband was recently murdered.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我就開門見山吧。我丈夫最近被謀殺了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_178
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks at you, waiting for a reaction.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_180
TranslationLabels.Text: (She responds with a hint of coldness in her voice.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_182
TranslationLabels.Text: Due to the circumstances surrounding his death, we are currently not allowed to leave the house without a police escort.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 由於他死亡的情況，目前我們在沒有警察護送的情況下不允許離開家。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_185
TranslationLabels.Text: Yesterday, while discussing this with Detective Higgins, I expressed that we felt safe within the mansion and don't require protection.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 昨天，在與希金斯偵探討論此事時，我表示我們在宅邸內感到安全，不需要保護。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_187
TranslationLabels.Text: Even though he doesn't believe we are at risk, it is standard security protocol to be under supervision.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 儘管他不認為我們面臨風險，但接受監督是標準的安全協議。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_188
TranslationLabels.Text: He suggested I hire a private security company if I'm unhappy with the current situation.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果我對目前的情況不滿意，他建議我聘請一家私人保全公司。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_192
TranslationLabels.Text: Imagine my surprise, when I found out my late husband had a son, whom he neglected to mention in nearly 25 years of marriage!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當我發現我已故的丈夫有一個兒子時，他在近 25 年的婚姻中都沒有提及他，想像我有多驚訝！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_193
TranslationLabels.Text: Hold on a moment! Are you implying that you are...my stepmother?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 稍等一下！你是在暗示你是…我的繼母嗎？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_195
TranslationLabels.Text: That appears to be the case, yes.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_196
TranslationLabels.Text: (Is she for real?! I guess it’s not a surprise my father remarried...but still, this is not what I was expecting...at all!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她是真的嗎？！我想我父親再婚並不奇怪……但這仍然不是我所期待的……根本！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_197
TranslationLabels.Text: Judging from the expression on your face, you were not aware of our existence either?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 從你的表情來看，你也沒有意識到我們的存在吧？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_203
TranslationLabels.Text: (Was that a hint of annoyance in her voice?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_208
TranslationLabels.Text: (You feel like your whole world has just been turned upside down.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你感覺你的全世界都顛倒了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_209
TranslationLabels.Text: I understand this is a lot to take in.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我知道這需要考慮很多。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_211
TranslationLabels.Text: However, I would like to offer you a job, nonetheless.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 儘管如此，我還是想提供你一份工作。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_214
TranslationLabels.Text: Other than that you are free to do as you please, so long as you are available when I call on you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 除此之外，只要我拜訪你時你有空，你就可以做你想做的事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_215
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, this also means that you would have to stay at the mansion until this whole thing blows over.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，這也意味著你必須留在宅邸，直到這件事平息為止。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_216
TranslationLabels.Text: I-I don’t know....I think I need some time to process all of this.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不知道……我想我需要一些時間來處理這一切。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_217
TranslationLabels.Text: Besides, as a professional bodyguard, it would be unethical to accept a contract protecting a relative or someone with whom I have any personal relationship.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 此外，作為一名職業保鏢，接受保護親戚或與我有私人關係的人的合約是不道德的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_219
TranslationLabels.Text: I understand that. And I appreciate your professionalism.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我明白那個。我很欣賞你的專業。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_220
TranslationLabels.Text: However, I am sure you can make an exception in this case.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不過，我相信在這種情況下你可以例外。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_221
TranslationLabels.Text: The only reason I want to hire you is to keep Detective Higgins off my back.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想僱用你的唯一原因是不讓希金斯偵探打擾我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_222
TranslationLabels.Text: It will most likely be the easiest job you have ever had.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這很可能是您做過的最簡單的工作。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_224
TranslationLabels.Text: (Again, her expression changes, but you can't quite read if it's anger, annoyance or something else.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的表情再次發生變化，但你無法完全看出這是憤怒、煩惱還是其他什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_225
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m sorry. I just don’t think-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_226
TranslationLabels.Text: I will pay you $100,000. Half up front, half once my husband’s murder investigation is closed.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我將付給你 10 萬美元。一半是預先的，一半是在我先生的謀殺案調查結束後。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_228
TranslationLabels.Text: (That would be more than enough to pay off my debt with Ruslan!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這足以還清我欠魯斯蘭的債務了！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_229
TranslationLabels.Text: (Besides, where am I going to stay after I get evicted?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_231
TranslationLabels.Text: (You struggle to keep a straight face.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_232
TranslationLabels.Text: That is a...substantial amount of money.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_233
TranslationLabels.Text: So, do we have an agreement then?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_234
TranslationLabels.Text: (There is no way I could ever turn down an offer like this.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_240
TranslationLabels.Text: (I knew it sounded too good to be true.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我知道這聽起來好得令人難以置信。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_242
TranslationLabels.Text: As you can understand, they are going through a difficult period right now.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 正如你所理解的，他們現在正在經歷一個困難時期。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_244
TranslationLabels.Text: Not being able to leave the mansion only adds to their frustration.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 無法離開宅邸只會增加他們的挫敗感。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_245
TranslationLabels.Text: Getting us to our appointments <highlight>on time</highlight> is your priority.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 讓我們<highlight>準時</highlight>赴約是您的首要任務。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_246
TranslationLabels.Text: If you fail to do that, I will have no choice but to fire you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你做不到這一點，我別無選擇，只能解僱你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_251
TranslationLabels.Text: Failure to do so will result in immediate termination.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_252
TranslationLabels.Text: (That's an unusual condition, but I can respect their privacy.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這是一個不尋常的情況，但我可以尊重他們的隱私。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_254
TranslationLabels.Text: And finally, if you make my girls feel uncomfortable, in any way, I will fire you without hesitation.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 最後，如果你以任何方式讓我的女兒感到不舒服，我會毫不猶豫地解僱你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_256
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can’t agree to that, can I?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_257
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話說回來…100,000 美元是一筆很多的錢。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_259
TranslationLabels.Text: (It’s not like I have anything to lose...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_260
TranslationLabels.Text: (In fact, this may be my only chance to get out of the mess I'm in...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （事實上，這可能是我擺脫困境的唯一機會...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_262
TranslationLabels.Text: Outstanding. I knew we would be able to reach an agreement.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 傑出的。我知道我們能夠達成協議。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_264
TranslationLabels.Text: (The door opens and the woman that let you in earlier, enters the room.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （門開了，之前讓你進來的女人走進了房間。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_265
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her eyes briefly flicker in your direction.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的眼睛短暫地朝你的方向閃爍。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_267
TranslationLabels.Text: Would you please fetch the girls for me?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你能幫我把女孩們帶回來嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_271
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can imagine it must have been quite a shock to them as well.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我可以想像這對他們來說一定也很震驚。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_272
TranslationLabels.Text: I hope they took the news well?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我希望他們能好好接受這個消息？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_273
TranslationLabels.Text: As well as can be expected.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_274
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm not sure what that's supposed to mean.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_275
TranslationLabels.Text: (There is a knock at the door.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_277
TranslationLabels.Text: (Three beautiful young women enter the room.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （三個美麗的年輕女子走進房間。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_278
TranslationLabels.Text: Girls, this is [NAME_1]. As I told you earlier, he will be staying with us for a while to ensure our safety.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 女孩們，這是[NAME_1]。正如我之前告訴過你的，他將和我們一起待一段時間以確保我們的安全。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_279
TranslationLabels.Text: (Earlier? She must have been very confident I would take the job.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （早些時候？她一定非常有信心我會接受這份工作。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_283
TranslationLabels.Text: It seems so. I’m still processing it myself.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 看來是這樣。我還在自己處理中。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_286
TranslationLabels.Text: I can’t wait to get to know you!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_287
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her excitement is contagious, and you can't help but smile.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的興奮具有感染力，你會情不自禁地微笑。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_288
TranslationLabels.Text: I look forward to that as well, Olivia.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_289
TranslationLabels.Text: And this is Annabelle, my middle [REL_D1].
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這是安娜貝爾，我的中間人[REL_D1]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_291
TranslationLabels.Text: *Softly* Uhm, it’s a pleasure to meet you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_292
TranslationLabels.Text: (Annabelle's greeting is shy and reserved. She seems hesitant, but there's a glimmer of curiosity in her eyes.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （安娜貝爾的打招呼害羞又矜持，看起來有些猶豫，但眼裡卻閃著一絲好奇。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_293
TranslationLabels.Text: It's nice to meet you too, Annabelle.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我也很高興認識你，安娜貝爾。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_294
TranslationLabels.Text: Lastly, this is Victoria, my eldest [REL_D1].
TranslationLabels.Translation: 最後，這是維多利亞，我的大女兒 [REL_D1]。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_298
TranslationLabels.Text: Seriously, [REL_M2]? John is killed, and suddenly a stranger shows up claiming to be his son.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 說真的，[REL_M2]？約翰被殺，突然一個陌生人出現，自稱是他的兒子。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_299
TranslationLabels.Text: (She calls her father by his first name? That's interesting.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她直呼她父親的名字？這很有趣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_301
TranslationLabels.Text: Don’t you think this is all a bit too much of a coincidence?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你不覺得這一切都太巧合了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_303
TranslationLabels.Text: But, [REL_M2]...can’t you see he’s just after our money? Please tell me you don’t believe-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但是，[REL_M2]...你沒看到他只是為了我們的錢嗎？請告訴我你不相信-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_305
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline's hand slams down on her desk, startling everyone in the room.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳的手猛地拍在桌上，嚇到了房間裡的每個人。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_307
TranslationLabels.Text: (The three girls instantly lower their heads and nervously study the floor.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （三個女孩立刻低下頭，緊張地研究地板。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_308
TranslationLabels.Text: (Madeline’s voice drops back to her calm, though stern tone and she continues as if nothing happened.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳的聲音恢復平靜，但語氣嚴厲，繼續說道，好像什麼也沒發生過一樣。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_309
