TranslationLabels.Text: I know you girls are frustrated with being locked up inside the house and having the cops around all the time.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我知道你們女孩們對被鎖在房子裡並且一直有警察在身邊感到沮喪。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_310
TranslationLabels.Text: But now that [NAME_1] is here, the police will leave us alone.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但既然[NAME_1]來了，警察就不會打擾我們了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_311
TranslationLabels.Text: I have also asked him to escort each of you to your weekly club practice.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我還請他護送你們每個人去參加每週的俱樂部訓練。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_312
TranslationLabels.Text: Ooh! Does that mean I can go to swimming practice again?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦！這是否意味著我可以再去練習游泳？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_314
TranslationLabels.Translation: 真的嗎？！謝謝，[REL_M2]！你是最好的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_316
TranslationLabels.Text: Is there anything you would like to add, Victoria?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 維多利亞，你還有什麼要補充的嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_319
TranslationLabels.Text: Nevertheless, I will see you downstairs later.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不過，我稍後會在樓下見。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_325
TranslationLabels.Text: That will be all, girls. Off you go.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 就這些了，女孩們。就行了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_326
TranslationLabels.Text: (As the girls leave the office, Rebecca re-enters.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當女孩們離開辦公室時，麗貝卡重新進入。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_327
TranslationLabels.Text: Rebecca, please show [NAME_1] to his room, and explain the details of the job to him.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 麗貝卡，請帶[NAME_1]到他的房間，並向他解釋工作的詳細資料。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_333
TranslationLabels.Text: You are free to use any of the facilities. But only when Miss Caine and the girls are not using them, of course.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您可以自由使用任何設施。當然，前提是凱恩小姐和女孩們不使用它們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_335
TranslationLabels.Text: You are free to help yourself to breakfast, lunch, and dinner in the kitchen.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您可以在廚房享用早餐、午餐和晚餐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_336
TranslationLabels.Text: Miss Caine and the girls will have their dinner in the dining room and are not to be disturbed.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 凱恩小姐和女孩們將在餐廳吃晚飯，請勿打擾。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_337
TranslationLabels.Text: (What, I'm not even allowed to join them for dinner?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （什麼，我甚至不被允許和他們一起吃晚餐？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_339
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe she was just saying that so I would take the job?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許她這麼說只是為了讓我接受這份工作？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_340
TranslationLabels.Text: Please use the rest of the day to pick up your belongings and take care of any unfinished business you may have.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 請利用當天剩餘的時間收拾您的物品並處理您可能未完成的事務。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_341
TranslationLabels.Text: Starting tomorrow, Miss Caine expects you be available whenever she calls.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 從明天開始，凱恩小姐希望您在她打電話時隨時有空。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_343
TranslationLabels.Text: Your first payment will be transferred to you tomorrow.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您的第一筆付款將於明天轉給您。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_345
TranslationLabels.Text: I have sent Miss Caine’s and the girls’ schedules to your phone. Make sure they arrive at their appointments on time and that you treat them with the utmost respect.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我已將凱恩小姐和女孩們的日程安排發送到你的手機上。確保他們準時到達預約地點，並確保您給予他們最大的尊重。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_352
TranslationLabels.Text: The likes of me?! What is that supposed to-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 喜歡我的人？！那應該是什麼——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_354
TranslationLabels.Text: So, while you stay under their roof, you will treat them with respect.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 因此，當您住在他們的屋簷下時，您會尊重他們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_359
TranslationLabels.Text: I will make sure to always treat them with the proper respect.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我將確保始終以適當的尊重對待他們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_10_363
TranslationLabels.Text: (At least I managed to calm her down a bit.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_11_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's go to my apartment first, by selecting it on the city tab on the map.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我們先去我的公寓，在地圖上的城市選項卡上選擇它。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (The sooner I gather my things, the sooner I’m out of here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我越早收拾東西，就能越早離開這裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (But it shouldn't take me long...most of this stuff isn’t even mine anyway.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但這不會花我很長時間……無論如何，這些東西大部分都不是我的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not that I would want any of this junk...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (Anyway, I’ll just grab my clothes and the few personal belongings I have left, so I can leave this place once and for all.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （總之，我就帶上衣服和僅剩的幾件私人物品，就可以徹底離開這個地方了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_10
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好吧，這就是我所擁有的一切。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (Damn! That took me way longer than I thought!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （該死！這比我想像的要長得多！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (Anyway, let’s head back to the mansion.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (Ooh, I like the sound of that!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (Who would have thought that I’d be trading in this cramped little apartment for a fancy-ass mansion?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （誰會想到我會把這間狹窄的小公寓換成一棟豪華的豪宅？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_12_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess good things do come to those who wait...hehe!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想好事總會降臨在那些等待的人身上…呵呵！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_14_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't see any reason to go back there.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我看不出有什麼理由回到那裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_15_2
TranslationLabels.Translation: （維多利亞的拳擊課於 19:30 開始。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_15_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I better go pick her up, before she's late!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我最好在她遲到之前去接她！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_16_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I really need some coffee right now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_16_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's use the map to go to the kitchen.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_17_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I should wait here until Madeline returns.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我應該在這裡等瑪德琳回來。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_18_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Huh, Rebecca? I wonder what she wants with me.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，麗貝卡？我想知道她想和我做什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_18_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Miss Caine has asked me to invite you to join her and the girls for dinner.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 凱恩小姐要我邀請你和她以及女兒們一起吃晚餐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_18_8
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to prepare dinner.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，請原諒，我需要準備晚餐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_18_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems Madeline is finally warming up to me...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （看來瑪德琳終於對我熱情起來了……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_18_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (It would probably be smart to accept her invitation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （接受她的邀請可能是明智之舉。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Time to find out what's behind that metal door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （是時候找出那扇金屬門後面是什麼了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, the corridor seems to split at the end.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (But there are also corridors to my left and right.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's start with that one and see where it leads...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （讓我們從那個開始，看看它會走向何方…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you get closer to the ladder, you notice a hole in the wall.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你靠近梯子時，你注意到牆上有一個洞。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (This is the backside of an air vent!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's too dark to see through it...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (But that must be the storage room Rebecca was talking about!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但這一定是麗貝卡所說的儲藏室！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm...that's an odd place for an air vent.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (This ladder seems to go all the way up to the second floor.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這台梯子好像一直通到二樓。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems to be a dead end.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (But there are two more air vents...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (Does that mean that the other corridors all lead to different rooms in the mansion?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這是否意味著其他走廊都通往宅邸的不同房間？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_33
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, Victoria's not in her room right now.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，維多利亞現在不在她的房間裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, I'll have to find out if my theory about these corridors is correct at some point...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好吧，我必須在某個時候弄清楚我關於這些走廊的理論是否正確...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_39
TranslationLabels.Text: (So that would mean I have to take a left at the back of this corridor, to get to the bathroom?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （那麼這意味著我必須在走廊後面左轉才能去洗手間？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (You walk to the end of the corridor...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_43
TranslationLabels.Translation: （讓我們看看這會帶我去哪裡...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_45
TranslationLabels.Text: (So that means the bathroom would have to be to the left...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以這意味著浴室必須在左邊......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (So this is how the blackmailer knew what I was doing?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以勒索者就是這樣知道我在做什麼的？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't believe I was being watched all this time...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (That means it has to be someone that knows about-)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這意味著它必須是知道的人-）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_53
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh! She's getting out of the bath...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_55
TranslationLabels.Text: (You have unlocked Victoria's naked paperdoll animation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （您已經解鎖了維多利亞的裸體紙娃娃動畫。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (I know I shouldn't be spying on her, but-)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我知道我不應該監視她，但是-）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_57
TranslationLabels.Text: (She leans over the bath to take out the stopper.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_58
TranslationLabels.Text: (-how can I not look at a body like that?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （——這樣的身體我怎麼能不看呢？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_62
TranslationLabels.Translation: （哦，夥計……她現在快要殺了我了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_66
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she moves to the other side of the bathroom, you lose sight of her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她移到浴室的另一邊時，你就看不見她了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_72
TranslationLabels.Text: (Your eyes are drawn to the air vent.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_73
TranslationLabels.Text: (The blackmailer has probably been spying on me ever since I got here...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （勒索者大概從我來到這裡就開始監視我了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_74
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, who else could know about the hidden corridors?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，還有誰知道隱藏走廊的事？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_77
TranslationLabels.Text: (The numpad in the utility closet looked old...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （雜物櫃裡的數字鍵盤看起來很舊...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_78
TranslationLabels.Text: (But Madeline told me they moved here recently...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但瑪德琳告訴我他們最近搬到這裡來了...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_79
TranslationLabels.Text: (So it's safe to assume that these corridors were put in by a previous owner.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （因此可以肯定地假設這些走廊是由前任所有者建造的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_80
TranslationLabels.Text: (She also mentioned that my dad was the one who bought the house...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她還提到房子是我爸爸買的……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_81
TranslationLabels.Text: (In which case, the seller would have most likely informed him about the hidden corridors.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （在這種情況下，賣家很可能會告訴他隱藏走廊的情況。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_82
TranslationLabels.Text: (And one of the keys was missing from the hidden compartment in the bookshelf...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （書架隱藏隔間裡的一把鑰匙不見了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_84
TranslationLabels.Text: (Although it doesn't explain how the blackmailer got the key from my dad...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （雖然沒有解釋勒索者是如何從我爸爸那裡拿到鑰匙的…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (The seller didn't tell my dad about the hidden corridors, for some reason...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （出於某種原因，賣家沒有告訴我爸爸隱藏走廊的事...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_87
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe they didn't know about them either?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_89
TranslationLabels.Text: (One of the girls found out about it just like I did?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有個女孩跟我一樣發現了這件事？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_90
TranslationLabels.Text: (Which would not just explain the missing key, but the spying as well!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這不僅可以解釋丟失的鑰匙，還可以解釋間諜活動！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_94
TranslationLabels.Text: (Perhaps I'll by able to find out more, by doing a little spying myself...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以透過自己進行一些間諜活動來了解更多...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_95
TranslationLabels.Text: (Or maybe, if I time it right, I can catch the blackmailer in the act, when they are coming out of the utlity closet!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （或者也許，如果我時機正確，我可以在勒索者從雜物櫃裡出來時抓住他們！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_97
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm finally getting closer to finding out who has been blackmailing me.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我終於越來越接近找出是誰在勒索我了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_99
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll make them pay for messing with me.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我會讓他們為欺負我而付出代價。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_19_107
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, maybe I can investigate the hidden corridors a bit more?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，也許我可以進一步調查一下隱藏的走廊？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_20_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's have a look at the map first.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_21_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's have a look at the mansion map first.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her tone implies that you are not welcome here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的語氣暗示這裡不歡迎你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_4
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦，對了……對不起，凱恩小姐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_5
TranslationLabels.Text: What did I just tell you?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Ah, [NAME_1]! Would you like to join us?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (Should I have dinner with the girls?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_14
TranslationLabels.Text: *Loud* Rebecca, could you bring one more plate, please?
TranslationLabels.Translation: *大聲*麗貝卡，你能再拿一個盤子嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_15
TranslationLabels.Text: You take your place at the dinner table...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_16
TranslationLabels.Text: *Gasp* Oh my God, that cat video you showed me was so funny!
TranslationLabels.Translation: *喘息*天啊，你給我看的那個貓咪影片太有趣了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_18
TranslationLabels.Text: I take it you had already finished your homework then?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想你那時已經完成作業了吧？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Now what did I tell you about getting distracted?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在我告訴你關於分心的事情是什麼？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_23
TranslationLabels.Text: I shouldn't have shown it to her while she was doing her homework, I'm sorry.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不應該在她做作業的時候給她看，對不起。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_25
TranslationLabels.Text: Still, Olivia should know better. Shouldn’t you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不過，奧莉維亞應該更清楚。你不應該嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (She glances over at you and smiles.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_29
TranslationLabels.Text: I will see you downstairs tonight.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_31
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她銳利地看了奧莉維亞一眼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder what goes on down there...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I could try using the hidden tunnel to spy on them tonight?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許今晚我可以嘗試使用隱藏的隧道來監視他們？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_39
TranslationLabels.Text: So, did you do your workout today, Annabelle?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼，安娜貝爾，你今天鍛鍊了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_43
TranslationLabels.Text: I know it's not your favorite thing, sweetheart, but it’s important to stay fit.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我知道這不是你最喜歡的事情，親愛的，但保持健康很重要。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Especially with all that time you spend behind your computer.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 尤其是當你花那麼多時間在電腦後面時。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_46
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! [NAME_1] told me he has a background in personal training!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦！[NAME_1]告訴我他有個人訓練背景！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_48
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe he could help you with your workout?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許他可以幫助你鍛鍊身體？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_49
TranslationLabels.Text: *Gasp* Oh, no! He doesn’t have to do-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_51
TranslationLabels.Text: Not at all. I would be happy to help.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一點也不。我很樂意提供協助。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_54
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh my God! You are SO lucky, Annie!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我的天啊！你真幸運，安妮！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_55
TranslationLabels.Text: Having [NAME_1] as your own personal trainer!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 讓[NAME_1]擔任您自己的私人教練！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_60
TranslationLabels.Text: I-I mean...I do...appreciate the offer...I just-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我的意思是……我確實……很感激這個提議……我只是——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_63
TranslationLabels.Text: Thank you for inviting me to dinner, Miss Caine.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 謝謝你邀請我吃飯，凱恩小姐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_65
TranslationLabels.Text: (She pauses, as if weighing her next words carefully.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她停頓了一下，彷彿仔細斟酌著接下來要說的話。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_66
TranslationLabels.Text: Since you're living with us now, I thought it would be appropriate for you to join us for dinner.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 既然你現在和我們住在一起，我想你和我們一起吃晚餐比較合適。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_68
TranslationLabels.Text: (But of course, I’m not going to bring that up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但當然，我不會提出這個問題。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_70
TranslationLabels.Text: (You finish the rest of the meal in awkward silence.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你在尷尬的沉默中吃完剩下的飯菜。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_71
TranslationLabels.Text: So Annabelle, how was your workout with [NAME_1] today?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 安娜貝爾，你今天和[NAME_1]一起運動得怎麼樣？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_78
TranslationLabels.Text: (Damn it, why did Annabelle put me on the spot like this.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （該死，安娜貝爾為什麼要把我置於這樣的境地。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_80
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe she wants to find out if I'll cover for her?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許她想知道我會不會替她掩護？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_81
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, Madeline seems to be on to her...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話又說回來，瑪德琳似乎對她很有興趣…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_85
TranslationLabels.Text: We decided to skip our workout today, because Annabelle was feeling a bit sore.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們決定今天不鍛煉，因為安娜貝爾感覺有點酸痛。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_88
TranslationLabels.Text: I will see you downstairs, tonight.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_92
TranslationLabels.Text: (You feel sorry for snitching on her...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_93
TranslationLabels.Text: (But you can't deny that the thought of spying on them excites you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但你不能否認監視他們的想法會讓你興奮。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_94
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes, we had a great workout.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_95
TranslationLabels.Translation: 安娜貝爾正在取得巨大進步。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_97
TranslationLabels.Text: Keep up the good work, you two.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_99
TranslationLabels.Text: (You smile back and wink at her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_100_104
TranslationLabels.Text: (You already told Madeline you won't be joining them today.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你已經告訴瑪德琳你今天不會加入他們。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_8
TranslationLabels.Text: And how did you get this number?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你是如何得到這個號碼的？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Now where would the fun be in me telling you that?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在我告訴你這些還有什麼樂趣呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_11
TranslationLabels.Text: I don’t have time for games.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, I’m sure you’re very busy.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Keeping those pretty girls safe from harm...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 保護那些美麗的女孩免受傷害...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_15
TranslationLabels.Text: You weren’t too busy to receive a visitor last night, though. Were you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不過，昨晚你並沒有太忙而無法接待訪客。你是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (You feel a shiver running down your spine.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_18
TranslationLabels.Text: I wonder how your employer would feel about that.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想知道你的雇主對此有何感想。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (First, let's find out how much they know.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （首先，讓我們看看他們知道多少。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_22
TranslationLabels.Text: How they would feel about what, exactly?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他們到底對什麼有什麼感覺？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_24
TranslationLabels.Text: About you fucking that pretty little maid, of course.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，是關於你操那個漂亮的小女僕的事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_25
TranslationLabels.Text: On your first day, no less.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在你的第一天，也是如此。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Shit! How do they even know about that?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (Or did someone see her going into my room?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （或者有人看到她走進我的房間？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (Come to think of it, she did act weird when I tried to talk to her in the kitchen...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （想想看，當我試著在廚房和她說話時，她確實表現得很奇怪...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (Or is she being blackmailed as well?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (Fuck! Why couldn't I just keep my dick in my pants?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （操！為什麼我不能把我的雞巴放在褲子裡？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_33
TranslationLabels.Text: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_34
TranslationLabels.Text: Then you don’t value your job very much.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那你就不太重視你的工作。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Shit! That's right. It won't be just my job that's on the line...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （媽的！沒錯。這不只是我的工作受到威脅…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (But they can't do anything without proof.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但沒有證據他們就什麼也做不了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_38
TranslationLabels.Text: What makes you think that my employer will believe you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你憑什麼認為我的雇主會相信你？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_39
TranslationLabels.Text: Do you have any evidence of these false accusations?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這些不實指控你有證據嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_41
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm sure you think you're very clever.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我確信你認為自己很聰明。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_42
TranslationLabels.Text: But we both know there is nothing false about them, don't we?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我們都知道他們沒有任何虛假，不是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_43
TranslationLabels.Text: And whether or not I have evidence...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 還有不管我有沒有證據...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_44
TranslationLabels.Text: If you don't do as I say, you will find out soon enough.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你不照我說的去做，你很快就會發現。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_48
TranslationLabels.Text: What do you want from me?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你想從我這裡得到什麼？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_51
TranslationLabels.Text: Really? You want to play a game?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_53
TranslationLabels.Text: Allow me to explain the rules to you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 請容許我向您解釋一下規則。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_54
TranslationLabels.Text: I will give you a task and you will perform it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我會給你一個任務，你會執行它。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to find out who this piece of shit is.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_57
TranslationLabels.Text: (But until I do, I better play along.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但在我這樣做之前，我最好一起玩。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_59
TranslationLabels.Text: Then let’s start with something simple…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那麼讓我們從一些簡單的事情開始...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_62
TranslationLabels.Text: You want me to take my junk out in front of her?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你想讓我當著她的面把我的垃圾拿出來嗎？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_64
TranslationLabels.Text: That will definitely get me fired!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_67
TranslationLabels.Text: Once you have completed your task, I will be in contact.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 完成任務後，我會與您聯繫。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_69
TranslationLabels.Text: And how would you even know?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_74
TranslationLabels.Text: (And why would they want me to expose myself to Olivia?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （他們為什麼要我向奧莉維亞揭露自己？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_77
TranslationLabels.Text: (If that's the case, why bother blackmailing me?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_78
TranslationLabels.Text: (They could just tell Madeline about me and Rebecca.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （他們可以告訴瑪德琳關於我和麗貝卡的事。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_79
TranslationLabels.Text: (Unless...they don’t really have any proof at all...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （除非……他們根本沒有任何證據……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_82
TranslationLabels.Text: (But that's not a risk I'm willing to take.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_84
TranslationLabels.Text: (If I’m wrong, I’ll lose my job.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果我錯了，我就會丟掉工作。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_85
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這在任何情況下都不會發生。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll have to get more information somehow.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我必須以某種方式獲得更多資訊。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_87
TranslationLabels.Text: (Besides, they could have an ulterior motive.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_89
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I'll have to figure out a way to expose myself to Olivia...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我得想辦法讓自己暴露在奧莉維亞面前…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_90
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I'll have to make it look like an accident.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我必須讓它看起來像是一場意外。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_91
TranslationLabels.Text: (I believe she takes a bath every evening...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我相信她每天晚上都會洗澡......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_92
TranslationLabels.Text: (If I time it right, I might be able to get her to walk in on me.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果我時機合適，也許我能讓她走進我的身邊。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_900_94
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's just hope I can put a stop to this before it gets out of hand...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （希望我能在事情失控之前阻止這一切…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_4
TranslationLabels.Text: You have completed your first task.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您已經完成了第一個任務。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (The only one who knows that is Olivia...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （唯一知道這一點的是奧莉維亞…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (Could the person she was talking to be the blackmailer?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （難道跟她說話的人就是敲詐者？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_13
TranslationLabels.Text: It seems you are ready for something a bit more challenging.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 看來你已經準備好迎接更具挑戰性的事情了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_15
TranslationLabels.Text: How long are we going to keep doing this?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們要繼續這樣做多久？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_16
TranslationLabels.Text: As long as I say we are.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_23
TranslationLabels.Text: Come on! You know I can’t do that!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 快點！你知道我不能這麼做！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_24
TranslationLabels.Text: It’s a miracle I got away with it the first time!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我第一次就逃脫了，真是奇蹟！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_26
TranslationLabels.Text: Don’t make me lose my patience.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_27
TranslationLabels.Text: I don’t care how you do it. Figure it out...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不在乎你怎麼做。想辦法...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (There's no way I can pull that off without getting in trouble.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不可能在不惹麻煩的情況下完成這個任務。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (But if I don't do it...I'll lose my job for sure.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但如果我不這樣做......我肯定會失去工作。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_33
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果他們不是虛張聲勢的話，那就是…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (But there's no way to tell...not yet anyway.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但目前還無法判斷……至少目前還不能。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess have no choice but to play along again...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （估計沒辦法了，只能再一起玩了……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (So this time Annabelle is the target?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以這次安娜貝爾就是目標？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (What would Olivia gain from me exposing myself to Annabelle?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉維亞從我向安娜貝爾暴露自己中得到什麼？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_43
TranslationLabels.Text: (Either way, I'll have to come up with a new plan...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無論如何，我必須想出一個新的計劃...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_44
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I could try the same tactics I used with Olivia.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我可以嘗試與奧利維亞一起使用的相同策略。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_45
TranslationLabels.Text: (After all, it worked the first time.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_46
TranslationLabels.Text: (Annabelle takes her showers in the morning.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_901_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (So I guess I know what to do...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以我想我知道該怎麼做了......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, I half expected another message from the blackmailer…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，我一半期待勒索者又發來一則訊息……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe they've grown tired of our little game?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許他們已經厭倦了我們的小遊戲？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_11
TranslationLabels.Translation: （讓我們看看他們現在想要什麼...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_15
TranslationLabels.Translation: 怎麼，這次不甜言蜜語了？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (If I didn’t know any better, I’d think something was wrong…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果我不知道的話，我會認為出了什麼問題...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (You jump out of bed and run into the hallway.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_902_26
TranslationLabels.Translation: 同時，在維多利亞的臥室裡…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_5
TranslationLabels.Text: What do you want this time?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_9
TranslationLabels.Text: Just get on with it already.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_10
TranslationLabels.Text: All right, if you're so eager to play...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧，如果你這麼想玩的話…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't worry, I'll go easy on you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 別擔心，我會輕鬆對待你的。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_14
TranslationLabels.Text: All you have to do is...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_17
TranslationLabels.Text: In that case, I might as well quit my job right now.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 既然如此，我還不如現在就把工作辭掉。

TranslationLabels.Text: Aw. Don't give up so easily.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_19
TranslationLabels.Text: Who knows? She might even like it...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 誰知道？她甚至可能會喜歡…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (Huh? What do they mean by that?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Why are you even doing this?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_903_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess it's time to get creative again...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想是時候再次發揮創意了...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1001_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (That's what you get, for not doing as I tell you!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這就是你得到的結果，因為你沒有照我告訴你的去做！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1001_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (Why do I even bother explaining these things?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （為什麼我還要費心解釋這些事情呢？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1001_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (Seriously, do you want this game to end before it has even started?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （說真的，你想讓這個遊戲在開始之前就結束嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1001_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (All you had to do was <highlight>move the mouse in a clockwise circle</highlight>!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （您所要做的就是<highlight>以順時針方向移動滑鼠</highlight>！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1001_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I can give you another chance.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我可以再給你一次機會。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1001_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (But don't screw it up this time!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1002_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Now get the HELL out of my house!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在把地獄滾出我的房子！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1002_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (Seriously?! I just told you, your actions will have consequences!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （說真的？！我只是告訴你，你的行為將會產生後果！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1002_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (And yet, the first thing you do is grab that poor girl's ass?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （然而，你做的第一件事就是抓住那個可憐女孩的屁股？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1002_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe you should try showing her some affection first?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許你應該先向她表達一些愛意？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1002_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (You know? Build up an actual relationship with her, and all that?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你知道嗎？與她建立真正的關係，等等？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1003_2
TranslationLabels.Text: I can't believe you fail to do even one simple task!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不敢相信你連一項簡單的任務都做不了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1003_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (She told you your priority was to get them to their appointments <highlight>on time</highlight>!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她告訴你，你的首要任務是讓他們<highlight>準時</highlight>赴約！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1003_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (How did you manage to screw up something so simple?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你怎麼把這麼簡單的事情搞砸了？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1003_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I can give you another shot...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我可以再給你一次機會......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1003_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (Try not to mess up this time, okay?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1004_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (You don't know when to take a hint do you?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你不知道什麼時候該接受暗示嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1004_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Although I'm starting to think it won't make much of a difference...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （雖然我開始認為這不會有太大差別...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1005_5
TranslationLabels.Text: Now get the HELL out of my house!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在把地獄滾出我的房子！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1005_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe you shouldn't get into fights you can't win.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許你不應該捲入無法獲勝的戰鬥。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1005_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess you want another chance, don't you?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我猜你還想再有一次機會，不是嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_1_1005_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (Try not blocking those punches with your face this time, okay?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這次盡量不要用臉擋住那些拳頭，好嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_2
TranslationLabels.Text: Even though Olivia is still young, she can be very persuasive. She makes sure she always gets what she wants.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 儘管奧莉維亞還年輕，但她很有說服力。她確保自己總是能得到她想要的東西。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_1
TranslationLabels.Text: She likes to watch TV in the living room in the evening.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她喜歡晚上在客廳看電視。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She takes her baths in the evening. If I time it right, I might be able to get her to walk in on me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她晚上洗澡。如果時機合適的話，也許我就能讓她來找我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_3
TranslationLabels.Text: In the evening, she's usually talking on the phone in her room.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 晚上，她通常在房間裡打電話。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_4
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her swimming practice on Wednesday at 10:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要帶她參加週三 10:00 的游泳練習。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_5
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her swimming practice again, on Wednesday at 10:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要在星期三 10:00 再次帶她去練習游泳。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I should cover for her at dinner?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我應該在晚餐時替她頂替？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_8
TranslationLabels.Text: Let's watch some TV with her again.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們再和她一起看電視吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_9
TranslationLabels.Text: I should snoop around in her bedroom, when she is taking her evening bath.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她晚上洗澡的時候，我應該去她的臥室裡窺探。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_10
TranslationLabels.Text: I guess I'll just to have to wait until she finishes reading that book.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想我只能等她讀完那本書了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_11
TranslationLabels.Text: I could spy on her when she takes her evening bath.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她晚上洗澡時我可以監視她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_12
TranslationLabels.Text: I could distract her while she is doing her homework.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她做作業時我可以分散她的注意力。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe I shouldn't stick up for her during dinner.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許我不應該在晚餐時堅持她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_14
TranslationLabels.Text: I should spy on her and Madeline at midnight.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該在午夜監視她和瑪德琳。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_15
TranslationLabels.Text: I think I just need a good night's sleep.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想我只需要睡個好覺。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I should take her to swimming practice again.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該再帶她去練習游泳。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_h_17
TranslationLabels.Text: I could distract her while she is doing her homework again.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她再次做作業時，我可以分散她的注意力。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm so glad I have a [REL_B1]!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_2
TranslationLabels.Text: I can't wait to get to know him better.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我迫不及待地想進一步了解他。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_3
TranslationLabels.Text: He seems like a really cool guy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他看起來是一個非常酷的人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_5
TranslationLabels.Text: I hope I'll find a boyfriend like him one day.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我希望有一天我能找到一個像他這樣的男朋友。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_6
TranslationLabels.Text: I wonder if he's attracted to me too?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想知道他是否也被我吸引？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_8
TranslationLabels.Text: He's the best [REL_B1] in the world!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_9
TranslationLabels.Text: I think I'm in love with him!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_10
TranslationLabels.Text: I can't stop thinking about him...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_r_11
TranslationLabels.Text: I'll do <highlight>ANYTHING</highlight> to make him happy!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我會做<highlight>任何事</highlight>讓他開心！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (Time for a new chapter in my life!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （是時候開啟我人生的新篇章了！）

TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, I just realized I will be living here with all these women.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，我剛剛意識到我將和所有這些女人住在這裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (Sorry. I don't know where that came-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Suddenly, you hear someone sneaking up behind you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （突然，你聽到有人偷偷靠近你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (Judging from the sound of the footsteps, not to mention the hysterical giggling, you instantly know it's Olivia.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （從腳步聲和歇斯底里的咯咯笑聲來看，你立刻就知道是奧莉維亞。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_13
TranslationLabels.Text: *Gasp* Oh no! Who could it be?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Hmm, I don't think I've met anyone else...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯，我好像沒見過其他人…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_27
TranslationLabels.Text: Aren't you forgetting like the most important person?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你不是像最一樣忘了重要的人嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_29
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't remember anyone else living here.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不記得有其他人住在這裡。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_31
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm afraid you'll have to give me a hint.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 恐怕你得給我一個提示。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_33
TranslationLabels.Text: She's only the sweetest girl you've ever met!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她是你見過的最可愛的女孩！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_34

TranslationLabels.Translation: 而且也是最可愛的一個！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_36
TranslationLabels.Text: Hmm, I don't recall meeting someone like that...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯，我不記得見過這樣的人…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (She removes her hands and you turn around.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_41

TranslationLabels.Translation: （她穿著一些相當暴露的睡衣......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_42

TranslationLabels.Translation: （你會情不自禁地註意到她美麗的身材。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_44
TranslationLabels.Text: (And she's got a great pair of-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_48
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not to mention, a client as well.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_49
TranslationLabels.Text: (I shouldn't be looking at her like that.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不該用那樣的眼神看著她。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (Get your head back in the game, [NAME_1]!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess that's what I get for neglecting my sex life for so long.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想這就是我長期忽視性生活所得到的結果。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_53
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't have these hormones messing with my head...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不能讓這些荷爾蒙擾亂我的頭腦...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (Especially not while I'm on the job.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_58
TranslationLabels.Text: Or were you just admiring my awesome pyjamas?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 還是你只是在欣賞我漂亮的睡衣？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_61
TranslationLabels.Text: And you're right, they are pretty awesome!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_63
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't they look super cute on me?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他們在我身上看起來是不是超可愛？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_64
TranslationLabels.Text: Totally! They look super cute on you!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 完全！它們在你身上看起來超級可愛！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_69
TranslationLabels.Text: Anyway, I thought I'd stop by to welcome you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不管怎樣，我想我應該要過來歡迎你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_71
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess at least someone is happy that I'm here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想至少有人很高興我在這裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_73
TranslationLabels.Text: But I'm sure they'll come around once they get to know you a bit.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我相信，一旦他們對你有了一些了解，他們就會回心轉意。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_74
TranslationLabels.Translation: 謝謝，奧莉維亞。我很感激。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_77
TranslationLabels.Text: (She suddenly walks up to you and wraps her arms around you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她突然走到你身邊，用雙臂擁抱你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_78
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我真的很高興你在這裡。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_79
TranslationLabels.Text: (You feel her big breasts pressing against you, as she hugs you tightly.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她緊緊地擁抱你時，你會感覺到她的大乳房壓在你身上。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_82
TranslationLabels.Text: (You wrap your arms around her and hold her tightly.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你用雙臂環抱著她，緊緊地抱住她。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_83
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm glad to be here too.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_85
TranslationLabels.Translation: （等等。她……感覺到我的肌肉了嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_90
TranslationLabels.Text: (Suddenly aware of what she is doing, she quickly lets go and steps back.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （突然意識到自己在做什麼，她迅速鬆開手並向後退了一步。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_91
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh! Uhm, well...I won't keep you up any longer. I'm sure you're tired.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦！嗯，好吧……我不會再耽誤你了。我確信你累了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_94
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she leaves the room, you notice she is blushing furiously.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她離開房間時，你注意到她臉紅得厲害。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_96
TranslationLabels.Text: (You can't help yourself from checking out her ass.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你會情不自禁地檢查她的屁股。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_101
TranslationLabels.Text: (But this is going to be a real challenge.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_103
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm starting my new job tomorrow, and I need to be sharp.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我明天就要開始新工作了，我需要保持敏銳。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_106

TranslationLabels.Translation: （我會有足夠的錢還清魯斯蘭的錢！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_107
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't believe things are finally looking up again!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不敢相信事情終於又好起來了！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_108
TranslationLabels.Text: (It seems like my troubles are finally over!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_109
TranslationLabels.Text: (If you only knew what you were getting yourself into...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果你知道自己正在陷入什麼境地就好了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_110
TranslationLabels.Text: (You can't control yourself and decide to cop a feel.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你無法控制自己並決定接受一種感覺。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_1_111
TranslationLabels.Text: (Damn! She's got such a firm little ass.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Olivia should be here for her evening bath soon.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧利維亞應該很快就會來這裡晚上洗澡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I’ll just take a quick shower and wait for her to show up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我會快速洗個澡，等她出現。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_5
TranslationLabels.Translation: （沒有什麼比洗個熱水澡更好的了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (You quickly put the towel over your head to make it look like you’re drying yourself off.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你迅速地把毛巾蓋在頭上，讓自己看起來像是在擦乾身體。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you hear the door open, you feel your heart racing in your chest.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你聽到門打開的聲音時，你會感覺到心臟在胸腔裡狂跳。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (I didn't even consider someone else might come in and see me like this...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （沒想到會有人進來看到我這個樣子……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (But the sound of Olivia’s voice quickly reassures you.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (She glances down at your exposed body.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她低頭看了一眼你裸露的身體。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_25
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m used to living on my own...I never lock the door!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我一個人住習慣了……我從不鎖門！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_33
TranslationLabels.Text: (Coming to her senses, she quickly shuts the bathroom door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （回過神來，她趕緊關上了浴室的門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, I guess that went pretty well...all things considered.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好吧，我想一切進展順利……考慮到所有因素。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (Although, I do feel a bit bad for making her feel like it was her fault.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （儘管如此，我確實為讓她覺得這是她的錯而感到有點難過。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (But it's not like I had much of a choice.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但這並不是說我有太多選擇。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (I wonder if the blackmailer will really find out. There's no way-)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不知道勒索者是否真的會發現。沒辦法——）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_41
TranslationLabels.Text: (If they do, it can only mean two things...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果他們這樣做，那隻能意味著兩件事......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_44
TranslationLabels.Text: (Come to think of it, her room is right next to mine...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話說回來，她的房間就在我的隔壁…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_45
TranslationLabels.Text: (She could have spotted Rebecca going into my room!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她可能會發現麗貝卡走進我的房間！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_46
TranslationLabels.Text: (But why would she threaten to fire me?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但她為什麼要威脅要解僱我？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (She's the only one that genuinely seems happy I'm here...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她是唯一一個真正對我在這裡感到高興的人...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_48
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't imagine that she wants to get rid of me.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_49
TranslationLabels.Text: (Unless she doesn't want me to get fired at all...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （除非她根本不想讓我被解僱......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe she just wants to have some fun with me?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (If that's true, she's taking this a bit far though.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果這是真的，那麼她就有點過分了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_53
TranslationLabels.Text: (But at least it wouldn't be as bad as the alternative...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但至少它不會像替代方案那麼糟糕...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll have to keep a close eye on her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_55
TranslationLabels.Text: (Anyway, mission completed. Let's get out of here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （總之，任務完成了，我們離開這裡吧。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_2_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (You put your clothes back on and leave the bathroom.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you walk past Olivia's bedroom, you overhear her talking on the phone...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你走過奧莉維亞的臥室時，你無意中聽到她在打電話…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_6
TranslationLabels.Text: Haha, no! He just left the door open.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哈哈不！他只是把門開著。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_8
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, he's used to living on his own, so I guess he forgot to lock it.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯，他習慣了一個人住，所以我猜他忘了鎖門。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_14
TranslationLabels.Text: And you should have seen his abs!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh? I guess I am still in pretty good shape after all...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （喔？我想我的身材還是不錯的…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_18
TranslationLabels.Text: And that's not even the best part!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_3_23
TranslationLabels.Text: Hang on. I need to close the door.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_101_1
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉維亞正在和瑪德琳一起吃早餐。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_101_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, she seems a bit on edge with Madeline here.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯，她似乎對瑪德琳有點緊張。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_101_9
TranslationLabels.Translation: 正確的。好吧，祝你今天愉快。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_101_99
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's just leave her alone for now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_103_2
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我現在不應該分散她的注意力。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_104_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (As soon as Olivia sees you, she gets out.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉維亞一看到你，就走了出去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_106_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Olivia seems to be focused on her studies.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧利維亞似乎專注於她的學習。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Sorry, but I'm kinda busy at the moment...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_5
TranslationLabels.Text: I have to finish my stupid homework.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我必須完成我愚蠢的作業。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_6_1
TranslationLabels.Text: In that case, I won't distract you any longer.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 既然如此，我就不會再打擾你了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_6_2
TranslationLabels.Text: Too bad. I have this really cool video I wanted to show you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 太糟糕了。我想向您展示這段非常酷的影片。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_9
TranslationLabels.Text: But since you're busy, I guess it will have to wait-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不過既然你很忙，我想就得等了——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_10
TranslationLabels.Text: No-no! I have time for one video!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不，不！我有時間拍一個影片！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_14
TranslationLabels.Text: And did you see this one-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I totally lost track of time!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_18
TranslationLabels.Text: I better hurry or my [REL_M2] will be pissed!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我最好快點，否則我的 [REL_M2] 會生氣的！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (She dashes out of her room and runs downstairs.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Sorry, but I really should focus on my homework right now...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 抱歉，但我現在真的應該專注於我的作業...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_22
TranslationLabels.Text: I'll leave you to it then.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_107_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe that spanking Madeline gave her scared her straight, after all?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許瑪德琳打屁股的事直接嚇到她了？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As soon as Olivia sees you, her face lights up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉維亞一看到你，臉就亮了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_3
TranslationLabels.Text: Do you want to watch some TV together?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_7
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to use the bathroom.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_8
TranslationLabels.Text: I'm just gonna pause it real quick.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_11
TranslationLabels.Text: That sounds tempting, but I don't drink while I'm on the job.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這聽起來很誘人，但我在工作時不喝酒。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_12
TranslationLabels.Text: What job? We're just hanging out and watching some TV together...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 什麼工作？我們只是一起出去玩、看電視…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_13
TranslationLabels.Text: You do know it's important to unwind a little every now and then, don't you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 您確實知道時不時地放鬆一下很重要，不是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_15
TranslationLabels.Translation: （此外，喝一瓶啤酒也沒什麼壞處。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she gets up and walks to the kitchen...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (Your eyes are drawn to her ass.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你的眼睛被她的屁股吸引了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (I know I'm not supposed to be looking at her like this...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_21
TranslationLabels.Text: (But it's hard not to, when she keeps wearing these skimpy outfits.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但當她一直穿著這些暴露的衣服時，很難不這樣做。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Here you go. One nice, cold beer!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 幹得好。一杯好喝的冰啤酒！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_26
TranslationLabels.Text: I'll just put it down there...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (Come on! Don't bend over in front of me like that...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm starting to think she's doing it on purpose...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_31
TranslationLabels.Text: That was fun! Thanks for joining me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 蠻好玩的！感謝您加入我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_32
TranslationLabels.Text: No problem, I had a good time.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_35
TranslationLabels.Text: So, uhm...I guess it's good night then.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以，嗯...我想現在是晚安了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_37
TranslationLabels.Text: Go ahead and make yourself comfortable...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 繼續吧，讓自己舒服一點…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_41
TranslationLabels.Text: (As before, she returns with a beer...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （和之前一樣，她帶著啤酒回來了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_42
TranslationLabels.Text: (But instead of putting it on the table, she casually sits down on your lap.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但她沒有把它放在桌子上，而是隨意地坐在你的腿上。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_47
TranslationLabels.Text: A cold beer for my hot boyfriend.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 給我性感男友一杯冰啤酒。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_49
TranslationLabels.Text: (Huh?! Why is she still acting like-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (She interrupts your thoughts with a kiss...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她用一個吻打斷了你的思緒…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (And for a moment her soft lips make you forget what you were thinking.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有那麼一會兒，她柔軟的嘴唇讓你忘記了自己在想什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_54
TranslationLabels.Text: Olivia, stop! You really shouldn’t be doing that...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 奧利維亞，停下來！你真的不應該這樣做...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_56
TranslationLabels.Text: It’s just a sip of beer.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只是喝了一小口啤酒而已。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_60
TranslationLabels.Text: (She snuggles closer, making herself comfortable on your lap.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她依偎得更近，讓自己舒服地坐在你的腿上。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_61
TranslationLabels.Text: Why don't you sit...over there, on the other couch?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 為什麼不坐在那邊，另一張沙發上？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_65
TranslationLabels.Text: Don’t you want to cuddle with me, [NAME_1]?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_66
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her seductive tone evokes a stir of feelings within you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她誘人的語氣喚起了你內心的情感波動。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_70
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh, man…she's really making me hard on this-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_72
TranslationLabels.Text: I’ll let you borrow my laptop.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我可以藉我的筆記型電腦給你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_75
TranslationLabels.Text: You said you needed it, right?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_77
TranslationLabels.Text: I’ll leave it on the desk in your bedroom.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我會把它放在你臥室的桌子上。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_79
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks at you again you with innocent eyes.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她再次用無辜的眼神看著你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_81
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我確實想要那台筆記型電腦......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_82
TranslationLabels.Text: (And I can’t deny it feels good having her this close to me...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不能否認她離我這麼近感覺很好......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_85
TranslationLabels.Text: (I just have to be careful no one sees us...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我只是要小心不要被看到我們...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_86
TranslationLabels.Text: Fine, just for a little while then.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_88
TranslationLabels.Text: But if someone comes in, you need to get off right away!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但如果有人進來，你需要立即下車！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_92
TranslationLabels.Text: Thanks for letting me cuddle with you…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_93
TranslationLabels.Text: Anyway, I’ll go get my laptop!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不管怎樣，我去拿我的筆記型電腦！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_98
TranslationLabels.Text: (I’m going to have to be more careful with her...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_99
TranslationLabels.Text: (She's not as innocent as she looks...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_108_108
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll just leave her alone for now.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我現在就讓她一個人呆著吧。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (Yes! With this I can finally find out what that contraption in the bookshelf does.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （是的！有了這個我終於可以知道書架上那個裝置是做什麼的了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (Before you can make a decision, the bedroom door opens…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （還沒等你做出決定，臥室的門就打開了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_8
TranslationLabels.Text: [NAME_1]?! What are you doing in here?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (She closes the door behind her as she enters the room.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她進入房間時，她關上了身後的門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_12
TranslationLabels.Text: I...wanted to ask if you wanted to watch a movie together.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我……想問你們要不要一起看電影。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_14
TranslationLabels.Text: But why did you close the door if you knew I wasn’t in here?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但既然你知道我不在這裡，為什麼還要關門呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (How do I talk my way out of this?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Peeping on me as I got dressed?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我穿衣服的時候偷看我？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_23
TranslationLabels.Text: Hoping to catch a glimpse of my naked body?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 希望看到我赤裸的身體嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_24
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course not! I would never-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (No way! Is she really going to-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_31
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我只不過在逗你玩而已！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (You can’t help but feel a little disappointed.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_35
TranslationLabels.Translation: 幾乎？！拜託……我完全明白你了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_36
TranslationLabels.Text: You should have seen the look on your face!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你應該看看你臉上的表情！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_38
TranslationLabels.Text: *Giggles* You are kinda cute when you get all shy like this.
TranslationLabels.Translation: *咯咯笑*當你這樣害羞時，你有點可愛。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course, I want to watch it with you!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_45
TranslationLabels.Text: I’ll be downstairs in a few minutes.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_47
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess there are worse ways to spend the evening.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想還有更糟糕的方式來度過夜晚。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_56
TranslationLabels.Text: I noticed a book on your bed…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我注意到你床上有一本書…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_57
TranslationLabels.Text: You mean when you were snooping around my room?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你是說你在我房間裡窺探的時候？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_60
TranslationLabels.Text: I was wondering if I could borrow it from you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想知道是否可以向你借用。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_61
TranslationLabels.Text: What do you want with that old book?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你想要那本舊書做什麼？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_65
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, I guess you can have it…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧，我想你可以擁有它......

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_68
TranslationLabels.Text: (Don't tell me she's planning on reading that?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_69
TranslationLabels.Text: But I have to warn you...I am a veeeery slow reader.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我必須警告你…我的閱讀速度非常慢。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_70
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh really? How slow are we talking here?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦真的嗎？我們在這裡說話有多慢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_71
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh, I don’t know…a book like that?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_79
TranslationLabels.Text: Now what makes you say that?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在是什麼讓你這麼說呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_80
TranslationLabels.Text: *Sigh* What’s it going to be this time?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_81
TranslationLabels.Text: Hmm...I’ll have to think about it.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_82
TranslationLabels.Text: But I’ll let you know as soon as I have decided.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但一旦我決定了，我會立即通知你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (Frustrating as it is to be this close to solving the puzzle…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （距離解開謎題如此之近，令人沮喪…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_110_87
TranslationLabels.Text: (You can’t help but smile to yourself.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (You wake up to the sound of your bedroom door opening.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你被臥室門打開的聲音吵醒。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_9
TranslationLabels.Text: I've finished reading that book you wanted to borrow…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你想藉的那本書我已經讀完了…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_10
TranslationLabels.Text: So I thought I’d bring it over.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以我想我會把它帶過來。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Thanks, but...couldn’t it wait until tomorrow?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 謝謝，但是……就不能等到明天嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Actually…there’s something I wanted to ask you as well.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 其實……我也有件事想問你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_16
TranslationLabels.Text: Remember how you said I could ask for anything in return for the book?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 還記得你說過我可以要求任何東西來換這本書嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (She has an interesting way of remembering things...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_18
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, I have a favor to ask you...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_20
TranslationLabels.Translation: 今晚我可以……呃……留在你身邊嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Why would you even ask that?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her expression turns sad and it looks like she’s holding back tears.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的表情變得悲傷，看起來像是在忍住淚水。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_24
TranslationLabels.Text: It's just that..I’ve been having so much trouble sleeping ever since…you know…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只是……從那時起我就一直睡不著覺……你知道……

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_27
TranslationLabels.Text: I just feel so scared when I'm alone in my bed at night.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當我晚上獨自躺在床上時，我感到非常害怕。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (I hadn't even thought of that…now I feel like an ass.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我什至沒有想到這一點......現在我感覺自己像個混蛋。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_29
TranslationLabels.Text: Nothing bad will happen to you, Olivia.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 奧莉維亞，你不會遇到什麼不好的事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_30
TranslationLabels.Text: I will keep you safe, I promise.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我會保證你的安全，我保證。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_32
TranslationLabels.Text: That’s why I want to stay with you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這就是為什麼我想和你在一起。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can’t deny it would feel good to have someone next to me in bed again…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不能否認，床上有人陪著我的感覺真好…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (But if Madeline finds out, I can kiss my job goodbye.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但如果瑪德琳發現了，我就可以和我的工作說再見了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_37
TranslationLabels.Translation: 對不起，奧莉維亞……但我們不能。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (For a short moment her innocent demeanor changes.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有那麼一會兒，她天真無邪的舉止發生了變化。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_41
TranslationLabels.Text: Besides, don’t you think she’d be far more upset if she found out we kissed?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 另外，你不覺得如果她發現我們接吻了，她會更難過嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_42
TranslationLabels.Text: (The hair on the back of your neck stands up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你脖子後面的汗毛都豎起來了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_43
TranslationLabels.Text: And how would she find out about that, exactly?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她到底是怎麼知道這一點的呢？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_45
TranslationLabels.Text: Just like she won’t find out about me staying with you tonight.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 就像她不會發現我今晚和你住在一起一樣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_46
TranslationLabels.Text: (She closes the door and walks up to your bed.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_120_49
