TranslationLabels.Text: (Too bad she's holding that towel in front-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_400_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (She's got such a sexy little body...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_400_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (You have unlocked Olivia's naked paperdoll animation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （您已經解鎖了奧利維亞的裸體紙娃娃動畫。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_400_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (I could stare at those perky tits for hours.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我可以盯著那些活潑的乳房好幾個小時。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_400_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (You lose sight of her as she walks to the other side of the bathroom...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她走到浴室的另一邊時，你就看不見她了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_400_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (In that case, I better get out of here.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_400_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (You leave the corridor and return to the utility closet.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, this seems to be some kind of...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (Revealing a very skimpy, leather outfit underneath.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （露出裡面一件非常暴露的皮革服裝。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (Why the hell is she wearing that?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (As Olivia moves aside, you see Madeline sitting in a chair...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當奧莉維亞移到一邊時，你看到瑪德琳坐在椅子上...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Olivia meekly obeys and bends over Madeline's lap.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉薇亞溫順地服從了，彎下身子趴在瑪德琳的腿上。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_28
TranslationLabels.Text: It seems you know how to do as you're told after all, don't you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 看起來你畢竟知道如何照別人告訴你的去做，不是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_30
TranslationLabels.Text: *Tsk* If only you would have listened to me in the first place...
TranslationLabels.Translation: *嘖*如果你一開始就聽我的話就好了…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_31
TranslationLabels.Text: But instead...you insist on disobeying me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但相反……你卻堅持不服從我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_32
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她看著奧莉維亞裸露的屁股。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_33
TranslationLabels.Text: Leaving me with no other choice...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_36
TranslationLabels.Text: And you know how much I dislike having to do that...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你知道我有多不喜歡這樣做...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_39
TranslationLabels.Text: (She is enjoying every second of this.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_41
TranslationLabels.Translation: （並用力拍打奧利維亞的屁股。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (Could this be what Madeline meant, when she warned me not to interfere in their [REL_FM]?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳警告我不要干涉他們的[REL_FM]，這就是她的意思嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (Still...I can't just let this happen, can I?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不過……我不能讓這種事發生，可以嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (What the hell is wrong with me?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_57
TranslationLabels.Text: (Why am I getting turned on by this?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_75
TranslationLabels.Translation: （瑪德琳的臉上又露出了笑容。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_76
TranslationLabels.Text: I hope you learned your lesson this time.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我希望你這次吸取了教訓。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_82
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, off to bed with you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在，和你一起上床睡覺吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_84
TranslationLabels.Text: (Olivia gets back up, puts on her robe...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_86
TranslationLabels.Text: (And lovingly kisses Madeline on the lips.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （並深情地吻了瑪德琳的嘴唇。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_89
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she leaves the room, your head is filled with questions...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她離開房間時，你的腦子裡充滿了問題...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_90
TranslationLabels.Text: (What the hell did I just witness?!)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_91
TranslationLabels.Text: (Seeing that they actually have a dedicated room for this...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （看到他們居然有專門的房間來做這個…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_92
TranslationLabels.Text: (I assume this is a regular thing?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_93
TranslationLabels.Text: (What about the other girls? Do they come down here as well?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_94
TranslationLabels.Text: (I remember Madeline telling Victoria to "see her downstairs", so that would include her as well, at the very least.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我記得瑪德琳告訴維多利亞“去樓下見她”，這樣至少她也包括在內。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_96
TranslationLabels.Text: (Do they know what's inside this room?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （他們知道這個房間裡有什麼嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_97
TranslationLabels.Text: (Rebecca did warn me not to snoop around in the basement.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （麗貝卡確實警告我不要在地下室裡窺探。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_98
TranslationLabels.Text: (And she reminded me not to interfere in any [REL_FM].)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_99
TranslationLabels.Text: (Come to think of it, she said this was a storage room...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_100
TranslationLabels.Text: (But it sounded like she was hiding-)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_101
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh, I was lost in thought so deeply that I didn't even notice Madeline leaving.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （哦，我陷入了沉思，甚至沒有註意到瑪德琳離開了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_102
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I better go back to my room as well.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我最好也回我的房間去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_105
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm not sure what to think of all this.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不知道該如何看待這一切。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_106
TranslationLabels.Text: (Olivia getting punished by Madeline like that...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉薇亞被梅迪爾莉那樣懲罰…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_107
TranslationLabels.Text: (Although, it did look like they were enjoying themselves.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不過，看起來他們確實玩得很開心。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_108
TranslationLabels.Text: (So was I, if I'm being perfectly honest.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果我完全誠實的話，我也是。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_109
TranslationLabels.Text: (Both of them wearing those sexy outfits...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_110
TranslationLabels.Text: (Olivia bent over Madeline's lap like that...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （奧莉薇亞就這樣俯身在瑪德琳的腿上…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_111
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her sexy little ass getting redder with each slap...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （每一巴掌，性感的小屁股都會更紅…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_114
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should keep an eye on that room?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_115
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just to make sure the girls are safe, of course.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當然，只是為了確保女孩們的安全。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_401_116
TranslationLabels.Text: (Who knows what else I might see in there...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （誰知道我還能在那裡看到什麼......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you find a parking spot, you notice two girls waiting near the entrance.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你找到停車位時，你注意到兩個女孩在入口附近等候。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_9
TranslationLabels.Text: They’re already waiting for me. I gotta go!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他們已經在等我了。我要走了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_10
TranslationLabels.Text: All right. I’ll be here. Have fun!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好的。我會在這。玩得開心！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (She eagerly gets out of the car and runs up to the girls.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她急切地下了車，跑向女孩們。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_14
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess she really missed going to swimming practice and hanging out with her friends.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我猜她真的很懷念去游泳練習和和朋友們一起出去玩的時光。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (Huh? Why are they looking at me like that?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess Olivia told them about me.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我猜奧利維亞向他們介紹了我。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (And as they head inside, Olivia turns and waves at you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當他們走進去時，奧莉維亞轉身向你揮手。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should introduce myself to her friends next time.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許下次我應該向她的朋友介紹一下自己。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (You see the two girls that Olivia was talking to earlier leaving the pool.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你看到奧利維亞早些時候離開泳池時與之交談的兩個女孩。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (As they walk past your car, one of them whispers something to the other.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當他們走過你的車時，其中一個人對另一個人低聲說了些什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_27
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想知道奧莉維亞告訴他們什麼...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_32
TranslationLabels.Text: What's wrong? Didn't you have fun?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 怎麼了？你沒玩得開心嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_35
TranslationLabels.Text: They made fun of me again.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_39
TranslationLabels.Text: Those girls you were talking to?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_41
TranslationLabels.Text: I thought they were your friends?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我以為他們是你的朋友？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_42
TranslationLabels.Text: They are not! They’re always picking on me!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他們不是！他們總是欺負我！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_43
TranslationLabels.Text: They laughed at me and said I was lying when I told them-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當我告訴他們時，他們嘲笑我並說我在撒謊——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_47
TranslationLabels.Translation: 奧莉維亞，你可以告訴我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_49
TranslationLabels.Text: *Softly* I don’t want you to get mad at me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: *輕柔地*我不想讓你生我的氣。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_51
TranslationLabels.Text: Why would I get mad at you?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_52
TranslationLabels.Text: Because…I may have said something to them that was not entirely true…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 因為……我可能對他們說了一些不完全正確的話……

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_55
TranslationLabels.Text: You have to promise me you won’t get mad!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你要答應我你不會生氣！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_65
TranslationLabels.Text: (Great. I guess that explains the looks they were giving me...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （太好了。我想這解釋了他們給我的表情…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_66
TranslationLabels.Text: And why would you do that?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_67
TranslationLabels.Text: Because they are always making fun of me!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_68
TranslationLabels.Text: I’m the only girl on the team that hasn’t had a boyfriend yet!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我是隊上唯一還沒有男朋友的女孩！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_70
TranslationLabels.Text: There's plenty of time for that later!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_72
TranslationLabels.Text: But they keep calling me stupid names…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但他們一直用愚蠢的名字稱呼我…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_74
TranslationLabels.Text: So I thought if I told them you were my boyfriend...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以我想如果我告訴他們你是我的男朋友...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_75
TranslationLabels.Text: It would finally shut them up.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_76
TranslationLabels.Text: But of course, they didn't believe me and laughed at me for making it up.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但當然，他們不相信我，還嘲笑我編造的故事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_77
TranslationLabels.Text: (Yeah, girls that age can be pretty mean.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （是的，這個年紀的女孩可能很刻薄。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_81
TranslationLabels.Text: But you shouldn’t be telling lies like that, Olivia.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但你不應該說這樣的謊言，奧莉維亞。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_82
TranslationLabels.Text: People might get the wrong idea.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 人們可能會產生錯誤的想法。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_83
TranslationLabels.Text: And that could cause more trouble in the long run.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 從長遠來看，這可能會帶來更多麻煩。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_86
TranslationLabels.Text: I just...wanted the bullying to be over.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我只是……希望霸凌行為能夠結束。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_88
TranslationLabels.Text: But there are other ways to deal with bullies.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但還有其他方法可以處理霸凌行為。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_91
TranslationLabels.Text: Then I never have to see them again!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那我就再也不用見到他們了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_92
TranslationLabels.Text: Don’t say that! You were so happy to go to practice again!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 別這麼說！你很高興又去練習了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_94
TranslationLabels.Text: The only reason people bully others, is because they feel insecure about themselves.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 人們欺負別人的唯一原因是因為他們對自己感到不安全。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_97
TranslationLabels.Text: They are probably just jealous of you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_99
TranslationLabels.Text: Of course! After all, you are…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_101
TranslationLabels.Translation: 就像有史以來最可愛的女孩一樣！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_103
TranslationLabels.Text: Haha! I do not sound like that!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哈哈！我聽起來不是那樣！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_105
TranslationLabels.Text: I shouldn’t let them get to me.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不應該讓他們來找我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_106
TranslationLabels.Translation: 感謝 [NAME_1] 的鼓舞人心的演講。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_108
TranslationLabels.Text: (I realize that seeing her smile like that makes me happy too.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我發現看到她這樣笑我也很開心。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_114
TranslationLabels.Text: Next time, I won't let them get under my skin.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 下次，我不會讓他們惹惱我。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_116
TranslationLabels.Text: (She gets out of the car and goes inside.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_118
TranslationLabels.Text: (First losing her father and then having to deal with those brats.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （首先失去了她的父親，然後不得不對付那些小傢伙。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_119
TranslationLabels.Text: (But it's important that she learns to stick up for herself.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但重要的是她學會堅持自己。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_120
TranslationLabels.Text: (Otherwise those girls will never leave her alone.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不然那些女孩絕對不會丟下她一個人的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_900_121
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I'll keep a close eye on those girls, just in case...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我會密切注意那些女孩，以防萬一...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you drive onto the parking lot, Lena and Stacy are waiting outside again.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你開車進入停車場時，莉娜和史黛西又在外面等了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_10
TranslationLabels.Text: Just remember what I told you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只要記住我告訴你的話。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_11
TranslationLabels.Text: The only reason they pick on you is because they are insecure about themselves.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他們選擇你的唯一原因是他們對自己沒有安全感。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, uhm…I’ll see you later, then?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she gets out, you can’t help feeling a bit worried for her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她出來時，你不禁為她感到有點擔心。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (Don't let them get to you, Olivia...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, they might just be acting that way, because they know I’m watching them.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話又說回來，他們可能只是這樣做，因為他們知道我在看著他們。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe if I open the window a bit, I can hear them.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許如果我把窗戶打開一點，我就能聽到他們的聲音。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_25
TranslationLabels.Text: I knew you were lying right from the start!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我從一開始就知道你在說謊！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_28
TranslationLabels.Text: She made it all up, just to impress us!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這一切都是她編出來的，只是為了給我們留下深刻的印象！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_31
TranslationLabels.Text: He’s probably just some driver Mommy hired for her little princess.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他可能只是媽媽為她的小公主僱的司機。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_33
TranslationLabels.Text: I know, right? There's no way in hell a hot guy like him would go for a girl like her!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我知道，對吧？像他這樣的帥哥根本不可能去找她這樣的女孩！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (Seeing them making fun of her like that pisses you off and your heart goes out to her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （看到他們像那樣取笑她，你會很生氣，你的心也會向她傾訴。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (I know I told her to just ignore them, but it’s time someone shut those brats up…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我知道我告訴她不要理睬他們，但現在是時候有人讓那些小傢伙閉嘴了…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get out of the car and walk up to them.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_39
TranslationLabels.Text: I don't care what you two say! I-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我不管你們兩個說什麼！我-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_41
TranslationLabels.Text: (Lena and Stacy look at you with surprise on their faces.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （莉娜和史黛西臉上露出驚訝的表情看著你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_45
TranslationLabels.Text: (It takes a split second for her to realize what you are doing, but then her face lights up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她花了一瞬間才意識到你在做什麼，但隨後她的臉就亮了起來。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_49
TranslationLabels.Translation: *自豪地*我告訴過你了，不是嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_50
TranslationLabels.Text: But...aren’t you like, a bit old for her?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但是……你對她來說是不是有點老了？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_51
TranslationLabels.Text: What can I say? I guess I’m just attracted to younger girls...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我能說什麼？我想我只是被年輕女孩所吸引...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_52
TranslationLabels.Text: Especially when they are as cute as she is.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 尤其是當他們像她一樣可愛時。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_57
TranslationLabels.Translation: 無論如何，我們稍後再見。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_60
TranslationLabels.Text: (She suddenly wraps her arms around your neck...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她突然用雙臂環抱你的脖子…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_63
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess she's really trying to sell that we're together...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我猜她真的想推銷我們在一起......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_64
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can hardly let her down after coming this far, can I?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （都走到這一步了，總不能讓她失望吧？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_65
TranslationLabels.Text: (You hide your surprise as well as you can...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_71
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she breaks the kiss, you almost wish it would have lasted a little longer...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她結束這個吻時，你幾乎希望它能持續更長時間...）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_74
TranslationLabels.Text: (For a moment, you just look at each other...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有那麼一會兒，你們只是互相看著對方……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_75
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧，我們進去吧，女孩們。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_78
TranslationLabels.Text: (And with that, you are left by yourself, feeling both conflicted and surprised.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這樣，你就只剩下自己了，感到既矛盾又驚訝。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_79
TranslationLabels.Text: (That did not go exactly as planned.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這並沒有完全按照計劃進行。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_2_901_81
TranslationLabels.Text: (Those girls won't be picking on her anymore.)

TranslationLabels.Text: I already told you, it was a mistake!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我已經告訴過你，這是一個錯誤！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_14
TranslationLabels.Text: It just doesn't make sense to me.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_15
TranslationLabels.Text: Did I do anything to hurt, or upset you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我做了什麼傷害你或讓你不開心的事嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_19
TranslationLabels.Text: I should behave like a professional.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我應該表現得像個專業人士。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, in that case I'm sorry it happened.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧，既然這樣，我很抱歉發生了這樣的事。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_23
TranslationLabels.Text: I didn't mean to put you into a difficult predicament.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我並不是故意讓你陷入困境。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_26
TranslationLabels.Text: Well, I'll leave you to your duties then.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧，那我就讓你繼續你的職責了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (I still think there's something she's not telling me...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我仍然認為她有什麼事情沒有告訴我......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (But at least I managed to clear the air a bit.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但至少我設法澄清了一些誤會。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (Now, how am I going to get my hands on that book?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （現在，我要怎麼拿到那本書呢？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (I just need to find a moment to get into Madeline's room.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我只是需要找個時間進入瑪德琳的房間。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_5_33
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can sneak in when Rebecca is cleaning the bathroom?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以趁麗貝卡打掃浴室的時候偷偷溜進去？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (You walk up to Rebecca and greet her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你走向麗貝卡並向她打招呼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (But the look in her eyes leaves no doubt that she is annoyed at you for distracting her from her job.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但她的眼神毫無疑問地表明她對你分散了她工作的注意力感到惱火。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_3
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you couldn't tell, I'm rather busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你看不出來的話，我很忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_4
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you couldn't tell, I'm rather busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你看不出來的話，我很忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_5
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you couldn't tell, I'm rather busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你看不出來的話，我很忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_6
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you couldn't tell, I'm rather busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你看不出來的話，我很忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_7
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you couldn't tell, I'm rather busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你看不出來的話，我很忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_8
TranslationLabels.Text: In case you couldn't tell, I'm rather busy.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你看不出來的話，我很忙。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_9
TranslationLabels.Text: There's still a lot of work to be done.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_10
TranslationLabels.Text: And unlike you, I don't have the luxury of just standing around doing nothing.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 與你不同的是，我沒有閒著無所事事的奢侈。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_100_11
TranslationLabels.Text: So if you would excuse me.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_101_2
TranslationLabels.Text: Please let me do my job.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_6_102_2
TranslationLabels.Text: So if you would excuse me, I'd like to have my dinner now.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以，請原諒，我想現在就吃晚餐。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_d_4
TranslationLabels.Text: This rebellious young woman makes it very clear that she doesn't want you around. It will take a lot to break down the walls she has put up.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這個叛逆的年輕女子非常清楚地表明她不希望你在身邊。要拆除她築起的圍牆需要付出很大的努力。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_h_1
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her boxing lessons on Monday at 19:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要帶她去參加週一 19:00 的拳擊課。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_h_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She likes to sunbathe in the backyard in the afternoon.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她喜歡下午在後院曬日光浴。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_h_3
TranslationLabels.Text: She is texting in her room late in the evening, when she is supposed to be reading a certain book.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 深夜，她正在自己的房間裡發短信，當時她應該正在讀某本書。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_h_4
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her boxing lessons again, on Monday at 19:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要在周一 19:00 再次帶她去參加拳擊課。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_h_5
TranslationLabels.Text: I could spy on her when she takes her evening bath.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當她晚上洗澡時我可以監視她。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_h_6
TranslationLabels.Text: I need to take her to her boxing lessons again, on Monday at 19:00.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我需要在周一 19:00 再次帶她去參加拳擊課。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_r_2
TranslationLabels.Text: Maybe he's not here just for the money...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 也許他來這裡不只是為了錢…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_10
TranslationLabels.Text: You can’t just barge into my room like some-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你不能像某些人一樣闖入我的房間-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (She looks down and notices you are in your boxers.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她低下頭，注意到你穿著四角褲。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_16
TranslationLabels.Text: I thought you were in danger!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her eyes linger on your exposed body a bit longer.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的目光在你裸露的身體上停留了一會兒。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_20
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我真的很抱歉，維多利亞。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_21
TranslationLabels.Text: I will leave you to your...uhm-

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_36
TranslationLabels.Text: I thought she was in danger.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_38
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你可以表達一些感激之情...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_39
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't tell me you didn't enjoy the view?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 別告訴我你不喜歡這裡的風景嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_42
TranslationLabels.Text: (But there’s no way in hell I’m going to admit that.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_50
TranslationLabels.Text: (I need to find out who this is before I get in real trouble.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （在我遇到真正的麻煩之前，我需要找出這是誰。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (The only ones that could have seen me going into Victoria's room are Olivia, Annabelle and Madeline…)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （唯一能看到我進入維多利亞房間的人是奧利維亞、安娜貝爾和瑪德琳…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (But how would they know what Victoria was doing?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但是他們怎麼知道維多利亞在做什麼呢？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I'm completely on the wrong track here?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_58
TranslationLabels.Text: (But if so, how do they know what goes on in this house?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但如果是這樣，他們怎麼知道這房子裡發生了什麼事？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1_63
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can find some clues around the house?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以在房子周圍找到一些線索？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (As you walk past Victoria, she calls out to you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你走過維多利亞時，她向你喊道。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (You notice she's wearing a see-through bikini.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你注意到她穿著透明比基尼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (It takes all your focus not to break eye contact.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你需要集中註意力才能不中斷眼神交流。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_7
TranslationLabels.Text: Go get me a nice, cold drink.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 去給我一杯好喝的冷飲。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Then again, it might help me get on her good side...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話又說回來，這可能會幫助我站在她的一邊…）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_12
TranslationLabels.Text: Sure, I can get you a drink.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 當然，我可以請你喝一杯。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_14
TranslationLabels.Text: It's hot out here, so make it quick.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh? So you like bossing people around, do you?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （喔？這麼說你喜歡對人發號施令，是嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_20
TranslationLabels.Text: I guess you are not completely useless after all.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我想你畢竟也不是完全沒用。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_21
TranslationLabels.Text: (She returns to her chair without even so much as a "thank you".)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她回到椅子上，連一句「謝謝」都沒有說。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (She thinks she can get under my skin.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I don't lose my cool that easily...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我不會那麼容易失去冷靜......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (Especially not because of some spoiled little brat.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （尤其不是因為某個被寵壞的小孩。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_26
TranslationLabels.Text: I am your bodyguard, not your servant.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我是你的保鏢，不是你的僕人。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_27
TranslationLabels.Text: If you want a drink, get it yourself.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你想喝一杯，就自己去拿吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her smug look vanishes, just for a second.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她得意的表情消失了，只有一秒鐘。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_32
TranslationLabels.Text: Whatever. I'm not that thirsty anyway.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (She turns her nose up at you and goes back to sunbathing.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她對你嗤之以鼻，然後繼續享受日光浴。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_104_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (No. I'm done being her errand boy for today.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不，我今天不再做她的跑腿了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_105_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I better leave her alone for now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (Is that...one of the books of sin?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (She's wearing nothing but a top and her panties...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她除了上衣和內褲什麼都沒穿……）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_18
TranslationLabels.Text: Can't you see that I'm busy?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (But she doesn't just straight-up kick me out either...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Look, I'm sorry to bother you...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_28
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't tell me you're into that religious cult crap as well?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 難道你也喜歡宗教邪教嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_30
TranslationLabels.Text: Then why do you want it?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_32
TranslationLabels.Text: Let me guess...you're trying to impress [REL_M2]?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 讓我猜猜...您想給 [REL_M2] 留下深刻印象？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_34
TranslationLabels.Text: She's really into this stuff, you know?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她真的很喜歡這些東西，你知道嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_36
TranslationLabels.Text: But there's no way in hell I'm reading this crap!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我根本不可能讀這些廢話！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_39
TranslationLabels.Text: (You remember Madeline telling Victoria to meet her downstairs, on the day of your arrival.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你記得瑪德琳告訴維多利亞在你到達的那天在樓下與她見面。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_41
TranslationLabels.Text: Her face turns red and she averts her eyes.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她的臉漲得通紅，移開目光。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_44
TranslationLabels.Text: Do you want the damn book or not?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你到底要不要那本該死的書？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_47
TranslationLabels.Text: Then take it...and just leave me alone!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那就拿走它吧……別管我了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_48
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm...I must have touched a nerve there.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯……我一定觸動了那裡的神經。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_49
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I'm not going to waste this opportunity.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should look around a bit later?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我應該稍後再四處看看？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_110_55
TranslationLabels.Text: (Anyway, let's go. I got what I came for.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （不管怎樣，我們走吧。我得到了我來的目的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (You have unlocked Victoria's naked paperdoll animation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （您已經解鎖了維多利亞的裸體紙娃娃動畫。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (I know I shouldn't be spying on her, but-)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我知道我不應該監視她，但是-）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (She leans over the bath to take out the stopper.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (-how can I not look at a body like that?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （——這樣的身體我怎麼能不看呢？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_13
TranslationLabels.Translation: （哦，夥計……她現在快要殺了我了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (As she moves to the other side of the bathroom, you lose sight of her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當她移到浴室的另一邊時，你就看不見她了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_400_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (You leave the corridor and return to the utility closet.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hey, Victoria. Are you ready to go to your boxing lesson?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嘿，維多利亞。你準備好去參加拳擊課了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess she’s not thrilled at the thought of me being her driver.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我猜她對我成為她的司機並不感到興奮。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_4
TranslationLabels.Text: Well? Are we going or what?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 出色地？我們是去還是怎樣？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (An awkward silence hangs in the air.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (There has to be something we can talk about...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I just need to find out what her interests are.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我只是需要找出她的興趣是什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_11
TranslationLabels.Text: So, boxing huh? That's pretty cool!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_12
TranslationLabels.Text: *Rolls her eyes* Let's skip the small talk, okay?
TranslationLabels.Translation: *翻白眼*我們跳過閒聊吧，好嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Just do your job and drive me to the gym.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 做好你的工作，開車送我去健身房。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_15
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, so much for breaking the ice.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_19
TranslationLabels.Text: Is this the right address? It doesn't look like there's a-
TranslationLabels.Translation: 這是正確的地址嗎？看起來好像沒有——

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_20
TranslationLabels.Text: (She gets out without saying a word.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm basically just a glorified babysitter anyway.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無論如何，我基本上只是一個光榮的保姆。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (If Higgins really believed there was any cause for alarm, he would have never allowed me to step in.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果希金斯真的相信有任何值得警惕的理由，他絕對不會允許我介入。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Especially not considering my lack of business over the last few years.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （特別是不考慮我過去幾年缺乏生意。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_27
TranslationLabels.Text: (He probably just wants to cover his ass, in case something does happen.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （他可能只是想摀住自己的屁股，以防萬一發生什麼事。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (After all, now he can say it was Madeline's decision to hire a private security firm.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （畢竟，現在他可以說聘請私人保全公司是瑪德琳的決定。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh well, I guess I shouldn't complain...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's easy money. Not to mention way more than what I'm usually paid for my services.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這錢很容易賺到。更不用說比我通常為我的服務支付的費用還要多了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_31
TranslationLabels.Text: (So I'll just wait patiently for Victoria to finish her lesson.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以我就耐心等待維多利亞完成她的課程。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh, I must have dozed off for a bit.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (Several people are leaving the gym, so the lesson has probably ended.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有幾個人正在離開體育館，因此課程可能已經結束。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_36
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get out of the car and wait for her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_38
TranslationLabels.Text: (Huh? Why is she holding her stomach like that?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_41
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你受傷了！發生了什麼事嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_45
TranslationLabels.Translation: （顯然有什麼事情讓她心煩意亂。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_49
TranslationLabels.Text: Let me get the door for you.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (On the way back you can’t help but feel a little worried.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_52
TranslationLabels.Text: (Victoria has treated you like crap, but seeing her in pain doesn’t sit well with you at all.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （維多利亞對待你就像對待垃圾一樣，但看到她痛苦你根本不舒服。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_55
TranslationLabels.Text: (But before you can say anything, Victoria gets out of the car and goes inside.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但你還來不及說什麼，維多利亞就下了車，走進去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_900_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (Despite her attitude towards you, you can't help but feel sorry for her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （儘管她對你的態度如此，你還是情不自禁地為她感到難過。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hey, Victoria. Are you ready to go to your boxing lesson?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嘿，維多利亞。你準備好去參加拳擊課了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess this is going to be another long ride.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想這將是另一趟漫長的旅程。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_4
TranslationLabels.Translation: 出色地？我們可以走了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_8
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just like last time, silence fills the air.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （就像上次一樣，空氣中一片寂靜。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (But this time, you don't even try talking to her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但這次，你甚至不嘗試和她說話。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_11
TranslationLabels.Text: (You arrive at the gym and park the car.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (And again, she gets out without a word.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她再次一言不發地走了出去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_13
TranslationLabels.Text: (Well, I guess it's time for my nap...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her lesson should be over in a few minutes.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess I should at least act like this is a real job...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想我至少應該表現得像這是一份真正的工作......）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get out of the car to wait for her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (What the fuck?! She seems to be in pain again...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get the door, without saying anything.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Some guy on the other side of the street calls out to her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_28
TranslationLabels.Text: If you got the stomach for it...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (The hairs on the back of your neck stand up.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你脖子後面的汗毛都豎起來了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_36
TranslationLabels.Text: Is he the one who keeps hurting you?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他是那個一直傷害你的人嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_40
TranslationLabels.Text: Fine. Then I guess I'll just have to ask him myself.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 美好的。那我想我只能親自去問他了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_41
TranslationLabels.Text: His name is Devon, all right?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_43
TranslationLabels.Text: And he's just a typical alpha male asshole.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他只是一個典型的阿爾法男性混蛋。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_44
TranslationLabels.Text: That's all there is to it...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_45
TranslationLabels.Text: You don't have to put up with this, Victoria.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你不必忍受這些，維多利亞。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_46
TranslationLabels.Text: You go there for boxing lessons, not to get beat up.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你去那裡是為了上拳擊課，而不是為了挨打。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_50
TranslationLabels.Text: *Softly* Now can we please just go home?
TranslationLabels.Translation: *輕輕地*現在我們可以回家了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_51
TranslationLabels.Text: (It doesn't sit right with you, but you decide not to press her any further.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這不適合你，但你決定不再給她壓力。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_54
TranslationLabels.Text: (Victoria gets out of the car without another word and goes inside.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （維多利亞二話沒說下了車，走進去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_56
TranslationLabels.Text: (I know sparring can get a little rough sometimes, but this seems excessive.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我知道陪練有時會變得有點粗暴，但這似乎太過分了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_57
TranslationLabels.Text: (And I have a feeling that this Devon guy is the one hurting her.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我有一種感覺，這個德文郡的傢伙就是傷害她的人。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_901_58
TranslationLabels.Text: (I think he and I should have a little chat next week...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_2
TranslationLabels.Text: *Scoffs* I'm surprised you made it on time.
TranslationLabels.Translation: *嘲笑*我很驚訝你能準時到達。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_3
TranslationLabels.Text: I can see you are in your regular friendly mood.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我看得出來你心情一如既往地友好。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (The sooner I get this over with the better.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_8
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在又一次尷尬的駕駛之後......

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (You arrive at the gym and park the car.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (As usual, she gets out without a word.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （像往常一樣，她一言不發地走了出去。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_12
TranslationLabels.Text: (I might as well catch some shut-eye.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_16
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe taking Victoria to her boxing lessons isn't so bad after all.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許帶維多利亞去參加拳擊課並不是那麼糟糕。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_17
TranslationLabels.Text: (Speaking of which...what's keeping her so long?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （話說……是什麼讓她堅持了這麼久？）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_21
TranslationLabels.Text: Look, I already told you, Devon, I’m NOT interested!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 聽著，我已經告訴過你了，德文，我沒興趣！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Come on, babe, stop playing hard to get.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 來吧，寶貝，別再玩欲擒故縱的遊戲了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_23
TranslationLabels.Text: We both know you want to.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_24
TranslationLabels.Text: What part of “no” don’t you get?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你不明白「不」的哪一部分？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_26
TranslationLabels.Text: So just leave me alone and let me spar with someone else!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 那你就放過我吧，讓我去跟別人打架吧！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_27
TranslationLabels.Text: Now listen here, you little slut!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 現在聽著，你這個小蕩婦！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_30
TranslationLabels.Text: I decide who gets to spar who!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_31
TranslationLabels.Text: So, you better start showing me some love...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 所以，你最好開始向我展示一些愛...

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_32
TranslationLabels.Text: Or you will be stuck sparring me forever.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不然你會永遠困在我身邊。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_33
TranslationLabels.Text: And you know I don't hold back.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_34
TranslationLabels.Translation: 把你的手從她身上拿開…現在！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_36
TranslationLabels.Translation: 放鬆點，兄弟……我們只是在玩而已。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (As soon as she sees you, Victoria runs over to you.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （維多利亞一看到你，就跑向你。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_40
TranslationLabels.Text: (You knew this guy was trouble the moment you saw him.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你一看到這個傢伙就知道他是個麻煩。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_41
TranslationLabels.Text: (And probably the reason Victoria has been feeling miserable after each training.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這也可能是維多利亞每次訓練後都會感到痛苦的原因。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_43
TranslationLabels.Text: She just needed some one-on-one coaching.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她只需要一些一對一的輔導。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_44
TranslationLabels.Text: You know how these chicks are, right?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你知道這些小雞怎麼樣，對吧？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_45
TranslationLabels.Text: (Your hands are itching to teach this piece of shit a lesson.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你的手很癢，想給這個狗屎一個教訓。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_46
TranslationLabels.Text: (But you know better than getting into fights that can be avoided.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但你比陷入本來可以避免的爭吵更清楚。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_47
TranslationLabels.Text: Just remember what I said, Victoria.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 只要記住我說的話，維多利亞。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_49
TranslationLabels.Text: There won’t be a next week.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_50
TranslationLabels.Text: Huh? What’s that supposed to mean?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_54
TranslationLabels.Text: Who the hell do you think you are?!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_55
TranslationLabels.Text: Barging into MY gym and disrespecting ME like that?!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 闖入我的健身房並這樣不尊重我？！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_56
TranslationLabels.Text: You better get the fuck out of here before I beat the shit out of you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 在我把你打垮之前，你最好趕快離開這裡。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_61
TranslationLabels.Text: You better run your little bitch-ass out of here!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你最好把你的小賤人趕出去！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_62
TranslationLabels.Text: And take that cock-teasing whore with you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 把那個逗雞雞的妓女也帶上吧。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_67
TranslationLabels.Text: Don't worry. This will only take a minute.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 不用擔心。這只需要一分鐘。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_70
TranslationLabels.Text: You have no idea who you're messing with.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 你根本不知道你在跟誰打交道。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_73
TranslationLabels.Text: It only did take a minute.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_74
TranslationLabels.Text: Now, get the FUCK out of my gym!

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_79
TranslationLabels.Text: Fuck! I...think I have a concussion.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他媽的！我……我想我有腦震盪。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_81
TranslationLabels.Text: If you ever come near Victoria again, I'll do much worse.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 如果你再靠近維多利亞，我會做得更糟。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_84
TranslationLabels.Text: *Scoffs* Not so tough now, are we?

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_91
TranslationLabels.Text: (As your eyes meet she averts her gaze.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （當你們的目光相遇時，她移開目光。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_93
TranslationLabels.Text: (Is she angry with me for interfering?)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_94
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should have just stayed out of it...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_95
TranslationLabels.Text: (She didn’t ask for my help after all.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_97
TranslationLabels.Text: (Her voice trails off, her eyes drifting away from you again.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （她的聲音逐漸減弱，目光再次從你身上移開。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_98
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm not just going to stand by and watch that asshole put his hands on her!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不會袖手旁觀，看著那個混蛋把手放在她身上！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_101
TranslationLabels.Text: (But unlike before, she doesn’t exit the car as soon as you stop.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但與以前不同的是，你一停下來，她並沒有立即下車。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_108
TranslationLabels.Text: Well…because of me you won’t be able to train at that gym anymore.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好吧……因為我，你將無法再在那個健身房訓練了。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_109
TranslationLabels.Text: Trust me…I never want to go back to that place again!
TranslationLabels.Translation: 相信我……我再也不想回到那個地方了！

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_111
TranslationLabels.Text: And he totally got what was coming to him.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 他完全明白了即將發生的事情。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_115
TranslationLabels.Text: I’ve been nothing but a bitch to you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我對你來說只是個婊子。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_117
TranslationLabels.Text: You still stood up for me.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_120
TranslationLabels.Text: We may not always see eye to eye…
TranslationLabels.Translation: 我們可能並不總是意見一致…

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_121
TranslationLabels.Text: But I will never let anyone hurt you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 但我永遠不會讓任何人傷害你。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_127
TranslationLabels.Text: (You get out of the car and walk towards her.)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_128
TranslationLabels.Text: (I better make sure she's all right...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_129
TranslationLabels.Text: (But before you can say anything, she throws her arms around your neck, tears streaming down her cheeks.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但你還來不及說什麼，她就用雙臂摟住你的脖子，淚水順著臉頰流下來。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_130
TranslationLabels.Text: *Cries* I’m so sorry for how I treated you.
TranslationLabels.Translation: *哭泣*我對我對待你的方式感到非常抱歉。

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_131
TranslationLabels.Text: *Cries* You didn't deserve any of that.

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_140
TranslationLabels.Text: (She holds onto you a little longer...)

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_141
TranslationLabels.Translation: （在放手之前，幾乎是不情願的。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_902_150
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe now, we can finally put the past behind us.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許現在，我們終於可以把過去拋在腦後了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_910_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hey, Victoria. Are you ready to go to your boxing lesson?
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嘿，維多利亞。你準備好去參加拳擊課了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_910_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess this is going to be another long ride.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想這將是另一趟漫長的旅程。）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_910_4
TranslationLabels.Translation: 出色地？我們可以走了嗎？

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1000_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (What the hell is keeping him so long?!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （到底是什麼讓他堅持了這麼久？！）

TranslationLabels.Label: c_4_1000_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm already late for my boxing lessons!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_410_2_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not that I have any reason to open it.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （並不是說我有任何理由打開它。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_410_2_3
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯……我不是早就找到鑰匙了嗎？）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_1_1
TranslationLabels.Translation: （超豪華、三層絎縫的豪華衛生紙。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, I think I've got an idea...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's just leave that where it is.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_3_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't want to put Kate through unclogging the toilet again...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_4_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't need to go right now...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_5_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can find a way to clog the toilet somehow...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我可以找到一種方法來堵塞廁所......）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_7_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Ahh...nothing like a douche for your tush.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （啊……沒有什麼比沖洗你的屁股更好的了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_140_8_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'm not going to rummage through the trash.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_300_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh! Olivia left her laptop on the desk.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （哦！奧莉維亞把她的筆記型電腦放在桌上了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_300_1_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I should try to install Hentai Impact on it.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我應該嘗試在上面安裝 Hentai Impact。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_300_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just a bunch of old, boring books.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_300_4_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (At this point, I'm starting to think that these are just background props...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （此時，我開始認為這些只是背景道具...）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_300_5_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I don't think there's anything useful here...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_280_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hmm, Annabelle doesn't seem to be in her room...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯，安娜貝爾好像不在她的房間裡…

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_2_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (All right, this is my chance to snoop around!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_2_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (So I need to be very careful not to make any sound.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （所以我需要非常小心，不要發出任何聲音。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_3_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Some creams, sleeping pills, and a couple of books.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_4_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (A sleeping mask, a pair of earplugs, and some hair clips.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （一個睡眠面罩、一對耳塞和一些髮夾。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_5_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Some lip balm, a phone charger, and a pair of reading glasses.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （一些潤唇膏、一個手機充電器和一副老花眼鏡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_6_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (This drawer is empty, except for a bunch of magazines about gardening.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這個抽屜是空的，除了一堆有關園藝的雜誌。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_7_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Just a pillow. There's nothing hidden behind it.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （只是一個枕頭。它後面沒有隱藏任何東西。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_9_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (A pile of books on all sorts of topics...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_10_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (I better get out of here before Rebecca catches me again...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我最好在麗貝卡再次抓住我之前離開這裡…）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_10_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's just hope Madeline won't notice the book is missing.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我們只是希望瑪德琳不會注意到這本書不見了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_250_11_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Oh? Madeline is not in her room...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 哦？瑪德琳不在她的房間…

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_251_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a regal woman, wearing a <highlight>golden</highlight> dress.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一幅身穿<highlight>金色</highlight>連身裙的富麗堂皇的女人的畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_290_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: Hmm, Olivia is not in her room...
TranslationLabels.Translation: 嗯，奧莉薇亞不在她的房間裡…

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_181_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a young woman in an <highlight>orange</highlight> dress.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一幅身穿<highlight>橙色</highlight>連身裙的年輕女子的畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_181_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She is surrounded by pastries and cakes.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她周圍都是糕點和蛋糕。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_421_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: It's too dark to see anything.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 天太黑了，什麼也看不見。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_171_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a beautiful young woman in a <highlight>purple</highlight> dress.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一幅身穿<highlight>紫色</highlight>連身裙的美麗年輕女子的畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_171_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She appears to be standing in front of a mirror.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_151_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a sexy woman wearing <highlight>dark-blue</highlight> lingerie.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一幅穿著<highlight>深藍色</highlight>內衣的性感女人的畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_151_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She has a seductive look in her eyes.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她的眼神裡充滿了誘惑。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_131_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a woman wearing a <highlight>red</highlight> feathered cloak.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一幅身穿<highlight>紅色</highlight>羽毛斗篷的女人的畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_131_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: She is surrounded by flames and looks quite intimidating.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她渾身被火焰包圍，看起來相當嚇人。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Your attention is drawn to a peculiar section of one of the bookcases.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你的注意力被其中一個書櫃的一個特殊部分吸引了。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (There are seven narrow slots, but only two of them contain books.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （有七個窄槽，但只有兩個可以放書。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (There seems to be some kind of hidden mechanism connected to these slots.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （似乎有某種隱藏的機制與這些插槽相連。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_19
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's see what this book is about.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （讓我們看看這本書講了什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_21
TranslationLabels.Text: (Gluttony, the vile harbinger of excess, doth poison the souls of the righteous and lead them astray from the path of temperance.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （暴食是過度行為的邪惡預兆，它會毒害義人的靈魂，使他們偏離節制的道路。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_22
TranslationLabels.Text: (It is a sin born of the flesh, a covetous desire that eclipses the spirit's purity, corrupting the very essence of the divine creation.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這是一種源自肉體的罪惡，一種遮蔽精神純潔性的貪婪慾望，敗壞了神聖創造的本質。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_23
TranslationLabels.Text: (O, ye faithful, beware the temptations that lay before you, for Gluttony in its relentless pursuit of gratification...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （噢，你們忠實的人，要小心擺在你們面前的誘惑，因為暴食在不懈地追求滿足…）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (Damn, that sounds like something straight out of a religious cult initiation pamphlet.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （該死，這聽起來像是直接來自宗教邪教入門小冊子的東西。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (There's no way I'm going to read that.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's just leave that where it belongs.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （讓我們把它留在它所屬的地方。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_28
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm...I wonder what happens when all slots are filled?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯……我想知道當所有插槽都被填滿時會發生什麼？）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_8_29
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I should keep an eye out for the other books?)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_9_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (At first glance, it's just an old bookcase.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_9_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (But there more to it than meets the eye...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但事情遠比表面上看到的要多…）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (You slide the book of <highlight>Greed</highlight> into the corresponding slot.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （將<highlight>貪婪之書</highlight>滑入對應的插槽中。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (You slide the book of <highlight>Sloth</highlight> into the corresponding slot.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （將<highlight>懶惰之書</highlight>滑入對應的插槽中。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (You slide the book of <highlight>Envy</highlight> into the corresponding slot.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_4
TranslationLabels.Text: (You slide the book of <highlight>Pride</highlight> into the corresponding slot.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （將<highlight>驕傲之書</highlight>滑入對應的插槽中。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_5
TranslationLabels.Text: (You slide the book of <highlight>Lust</highlight> into the corresponding slot.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你將<highlight>慾望之書</highlight>滑入對應的插槽中。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_20
TranslationLabels.Translation: （突然，一個隱藏的隔間突然打開。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_24
TranslationLabels.Text: (The other one seems to be missing...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (There are also a bunch of colors in the back.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_26
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I have no idea what they mean...)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (There must be some significance to these colors.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_10_37
TranslationLabels.Text: (Maybe I can find out what this key unlocks?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （也許我能知道這把鑰匙能解鎖什麼？）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_11_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Let's have another look at those colors.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_11_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (You press the hidden compartment and it pops open.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （按下隱藏的隔間，它就會彈出。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_11_9
TranslationLabels.Text: (There must be some significance to these colors.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_121_11_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (Alright, let's look around the mansion to see if there are any clues to these colors.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （好吧，我們去宅邸周圍看看，看看有沒有這些顏色的線索。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_211_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a woman, sleeping peacefully.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_211_1_2
TranslationLabels.Translation: 她穿著一件<highlight>淺藍色</highlight>禮服。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_271_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: A painting of a pretty woman wearing a <highlight>green</highlight> dress.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 一幅穿著<highlight>綠色</highlight>洋裝的漂亮女人的畫。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (There's seems to be some kind of metal door here!)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_1_6
TranslationLabels.Text: (I bet I can open that door, if I can figure out what the passcode is.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我敢打賭如果我能弄清楚密碼是什麼，我就能打開那扇門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_3_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (Not something you would expect to see in a utility closet...)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （這不是您期望在雜物間看到的東西...）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_4_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (I'll leave the door locked for now.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_4_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (If you want to use the hidden corridors, just click the corresponding section off the mansion map.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （如果你想使用隱藏的走廊，只需點擊豪宅地圖上的相應部分即可。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_6_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (It's late, and I don't want to risk making any noise.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （已經很晚了，我不想冒發出任何噪音的風險。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_450_6_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I should come back here during the day.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_1_1
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm, that seems to be the wrong passcode.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (I can't believe I managed to crack the code!)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我不敢相信我成功破解了密碼！）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_3
TranslationLabels.Text: (The metal door slides up into the ceiling.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_6
TranslationLabels.Translation: （我想知道這些走廊通往哪裡。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_7
TranslationLabels.Text: (I guess there's only one way to-)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_10
TranslationLabels.Text: (You quickly leave the utility closet and lock the door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （你迅速離開雜物間並鎖上門。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_11
TranslationLabels.Text: What are you doing down here?

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_13
TranslationLabels.Text: Nothing, just...exploring the mansion a bit.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 沒什麼，只是……稍微探索一下這棟宅邸。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_18
TranslationLabels.Text: (Huh? What was she about to say?)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_20
TranslationLabels.Text: Yes, it's where Miss Caine keeps her...personal belongings and you are not to go in there under any circumstances.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 是的，這是凱恩小姐存放她的……個人物品的地方，在任何情況下你都不能進入那裡。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_21
TranslationLabels.Text: (Oh, she is talking about the other door.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_22
TranslationLabels.Text: Remember the terms of your contract.

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_25
TranslationLabels.Text: (Could that be the "downstairs" they keep mentioning?)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_27
TranslationLabels.Text: Good. Then I suggest you stop snooping around here.
TranslationLabels.Translation: 好的。那我建議你別再在這裡窺探了。

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_30
TranslationLabels.Text: (She is clearly waiting for you to leave.)

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_32
TranslationLabels.Text: (Hmm...I wonder what's in that "storage room" that got her so on edge?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （嗯……我想知道那個「儲藏室」裡有什麼讓她如此緊張？）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_33
TranslationLabels.Text: (Or maybe she knows about the metal door in the utility closet and doesn't want me near it?)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （或者也許她知道雜物間的金屬門，並且不想讓我靠近它？）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_34
TranslationLabels.Text: (Either way, I'm going to find out what's behind that door.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （無論如何，我都會找出那扇門後面是什麼。）

TranslationLabels.Label: l_1_451_2_35
TranslationLabels.Text: (But I better wait until Rebecca finishes work.)
TranslationLabels.Translation: （但我最好等到麗貝卡完成工作。）

TranslationLabels.Label: i_8_1_2
TranslationLabels.Text: (You unlock the door to the utility closet.)
